hymnContent.content:
Murinzi, jy' uvuz' impanda, Uhan' umuntu wese;
Ng' uzumv' izo nkuru nziza, Yihan' akizw' ibyaha.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Murinzi we vuz' impanda!
Yivuze cyane hose (hose),
Menyesha bos' ubutumwa,
Imbohe zibohorwe.

Yivugirize mu mpinga, Mw' ishyamba mu gisiza;
Ndetse no mu nyanja hose, Bameny' ako gakiza.

Uyivugiriz' indembe, Na zo zikizw' ibyaha.
Yes' arabatumir' ati: Nimuze mbaboneze.

Yivugirize mu nzira, Mu rwiherero hose.
Dat' arabategereje, Ntacy' ataringanije.

Umwam' ageze kw' irembo, Wabambwe ku musaraba;
Yaje gukorany' abera, Babane mw' ijuru.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Kw' irembo (Kw' irembo), Kw' irembo (Kw' irembo),
Kw' irembo, Ub' ari kw' irembo; Nukw' araje (araje),
Nukw' araje (araje), Kand' ageze kw' irembo.

Ibyerekana kuza kwe, Birihuta kuboneka;
Kandi tugiye guhabwa, Kubaho kw' iteka.

Ntabw' intambar' izashira, Ntabw' amahor' azahora,
Kerek' ibyaha n' urupfu, Byatsembwe na Yesu.

Maze mw' isi yagizwe nshya, Niho tuzabahw' iteka;
Kudapfa kwakuye gupfa, Dushiz' agahinda.

Nzabona Yesu mu maso, Umuns' azatujyana;
Niho nzamwitegereza, Kw' ari we wampfiriye.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Ubu ndamutekereza, Ariko simmurora;
Umuns' uhiriw' uzaza, Nzamubonan' ubwiza.

Tuzishimir' imbere ye, Ubw' ishavu rishize;
Ibigande biganduwe, N' ahijimye hakeye.

Nzanezererw' imbere ye, Nzamurora mumenye;
Nzabana na Yes' unkunda, Niwe Mukiza wanjye.

Har' amakuru mez' amenywa n' abagenzi, Bazerera kure y' iwabo,
Kuk' Umukiz' agiye kuza mu bwiza bwe, Kand' agiye kwim' ingoma ye.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Azaza, ndabizi kw' azagaruka, Nukw' azaza rwos' azaza.
Abagenzi bose barembye, Bazakir' Umukiza n' aza kwima.

Ibituro by' abera bos' uko bangana, Byose bizakingurwa rwose;
Kand' inteko z' abasinzira mu kuzimu, Bazongera gutura kw' isi.

Nta kizadutanya mur' iyo si nshya nziza, Tuzaririmb' uko twakize.
Abacunguwe bazaba bavuye hose, Baramy' Umwami wo mw' ijuru.

Haleluy' amina, haleluya iteka; Nitwitonda tuzahatura.
Ba maso nezerwa, Kand' ujye wiringira, Maz' uzambar' ikamba ryiza.

Murinzi we! Menyesh' igihe! Mbes' iwacu n' imuhero?
At' ijoro ryijimye cyane, Ariko buracya.
Ntukarire, Gumy' ugende, Nturorere kwiringira,
Kugez' igih' uzasohora, Mu muns' uhoraho.

Murwanyi we! Tyo mbwira nawe! Ansubiza yitonz' ati:'nIntambar' igiye gushira. Guma ku rugamba.
Wibabara, Ihangane, Wirek' imirimo yawe,
Kuko tuzabon' ibihembo, Tumaze gutsinda.

Ndacyabaz' ibyaremwe byose, Binsubiza bitya biti:
Iy' is' igiye guhanguka. Haz' ind' idashira.
Ntukarir' ibimenyetso, Byerekan' aho tugeze,
Kand' ibintu byose byaremwe, Biriteg' impanda.

Imuhir' ubu ni bugufi, Tunezerwe mu mitima.
Duhumure ko tuzakira, Dushir' agahinda.
Ntukarire tuzabana, Amakub' azab' ashize.
Ntabwo tuzabur' amahoro mu rugo rwa Data.

Mwebw' abera mube maso, Ibyaremwe birahinda.
Mukomez' imuri zanyu, Mwiteg' Umwam' ari hafi.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Araje Yes' araje! Azanye n' icyubahiro.
Yes' aje kwim' ingoma Ye, Araje, Yes' araje.

Wibuk' Umuvunyi wave, Agakiza n' imbabazi,
Ikamba, icyubahiro. Jya wogez' ako gakiza.

Nta bwami budahanguka; Wumv' amagare y' asuma.
Bwira bos' iby' imbabazi, Ubu n' igihe cy' impuhwe.

Amoko yos' azashira; Krist' atebuts' Ubwami bwe;
Is' igiye guhanguka; Nimwishim' abahiriwe.

Banyabyaha mwe nimuze! Abitwarire kuri Se.
Mwese nimugire bwangu! Imbabazi zikiriho.

Ubwo Yes' azagaruka, Kujyan' abe bose,
Bemeye kumuyoboka, N' abatoni be.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Bazaka nk' inyenyeri,
Zitatse kw' ikamba rye;
Bazatangaza cyane,
Bakize rwose.

Ubw' azaza gukorany' abo yatoye bose,
Bera baboneye rwose, b' abatoni be.

Yemwe bana! Yemwe bana! Bakund' Umukiza;
Abakunda, abakunda, Nk' abatoni be.

Abarokots' ibyago byo hasi bazakoranywa, Ab' azatumir' azajyana nabo.
Umwami n' agaruk' ikondera rye rizavuga, Amatek' azab' agiye gucibwa.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Azaba yabararitse, Ubw' azabahamagara (hamagara).
Azaba yabararitse, Abazatumir' azajyana nabo.

Uwo muns' abapfuye muri Kristo bazazurwa, Bazava mu bituro nka we rwose.
Abo yitoreye bazimana nawe mw' ijuru, Ubw' azagenda, azajyana nabo.

Niho tuzajya dukorer' Umwami tudahwema; Tuzajya dusingiz' urukundo rwe.
Maz' ubwo tuzarangiz' imirimo yacu mw' isi, Tuzateranywa tujyanwe mw' ijuru.

Vuz' impanda yumvikane hose, Yesu agiye kuza!
Muririmbe bagenzi mwishima, Yesu agiye kuza.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Ari hafi, Ari hafi,
Umwam' agiye kuza.

Mujye muhererekanya hose, Yesu agiye kuza!
Azazan' icyubahiro cyinshi, Yesu agiye kuza.

Yivugirize mu nyanja hose, Yesu agiye kuza!
Yivugirize no mu bikombe, Yesu agiye kuza.

Mu misoz' uyihavugirize, Yesu agiye kuza!
Imiyag' ijyan' ayo makuru, Yesu agiye kuza.

Amok' ubw' azasubiranamo, Yesu agiye kuza!
Ubwenge bwungukwa bwerekana, Ko Yes' agiye kuza.

Duhurire ku mugezi, Dusang' abamarayika;
Amazi yaw' atunganye, Atemb' av' imbere y' Imana.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Nuko tujye ku mugezi!
Duhurire n' abera ku mugezi!
Ku mugez' utunganye w' Imana,
Utemb' uv' imbere y' intebe.

Ku nkombe y' uwo mugezi, Niho tuzatambagira,
Turamy' Umwami w' iteka, Mu gihe cyiza kidashira.

Tuzagera ku mugezi, Dutur' imitwaro yacu;
Tuzakirishw' imbabazi, Duhabw' umwambaro n' ikamba.

Ubw' umugez' uri hafi, Urugendo ruzashira;
Tuzishima mu mitima, N' indirimbo z' umunezero.

Mukiza ngukurikire, Ah' unshakira hose;
Ah' ujya ngukurikire, Mwami ngukurikire.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Mukiza ngukurikire, Wamviriy' amaraso;
Nib' utagir' ukwita ho, Njye nkwikurikirire.

Nahw' inzira yazitirwa, Naho yakukumuka,
Ko wayinyuzemo mbere, Nyicamo mfit' ishimwe.

Naho naterwa n' ibyago, Nkageragezwa cyane,
Warageragejwe nawe, Mwami ngukurikize.

Nib' unyobora mw' ishavu, Niba nkena nkanenwa,
Wigeze kuba ruvumwa, Nanjye ngukurikize.

Har' isokw' ivamw' amaraso, Yo mu mitsi y' Imanuweri.
Niy' atungany' abanyabyaha, Bagashirahw' inenge,
Bagatsembwahw' ibicumuro, Byose bikabacikaho.
Niy' atungany' abanyabyaha, Bagashirahw' inenge.

Mperey' igihe meny' isoko, Iva mu bikomere byawe.
Nogez' urwo rukundo rwawe, Nzahora ngusingiza;
Nzahora ngusingiz' iteka, Nzajya ngusingiz' iteka.
Nogez' urwo rukundo rwawe, Nzahora ngusingiza.

Mwami mpora ngucumuraho, Mpa kwizer' imbabazi zawe!
N' amaraso yaw' atunganye, Mpa kuramishwa nawe!
Mpa kuramishwa nawe Yesu! Mpa no kuramishwa nawe!
N' amaraso yaw' atunganye, Mpa kuramishwa nawe!

Har' indirimbo zera ntazi, Nzaziririmbira mw' ijuru.
Naho nagobw' ururim' ubu, Uzarugobotora;
Uzarugobotora Yesu, Ni wow' uzankiza rwose.
Naho nagobw' ururim' ubu, Uzarugobotora.

Mwami Yesu ndifuza k' umboneza; Ndashaka k' umba mu mutim' iteka.
Noye kujya nita ku bigirwamana. Umboneze rwose nere ndush' ingwa.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Ngo nere de ndush' urubura!
Mpa kwer' ubu ngutunganire rwose!

Mwami jy' undebera ku ntebe yawe! Mpa gutamb' igitambo kiboneye!
Ndeke gushidikanya nitange rwose. Umboneze rwose nere ndush' ingwa.

Yesu ndagutakambira nkomeje! Ngo mbon'uko nkwitega Mwami mwiza!
Ntunganish' umuvu w' amaraso yawe! Umboneze rwose nere ndush' ingwa.

Mwami ngutegereje nihanganye, Yesu ngwin' ump' umutim' utunganye!
Nti wari wirengagiz' abagushaka. Umboneze rwose nere ndush'ingwa.

Wumv' amatur' agwa, Ukw' ajegera.
Yose n' aya Yesu, Niwe dutura.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Agwa, agwa, agwa, agwa, Amatur' agwa,
Yose n' aya Yesu, Niwe dutura.

Ava mu tuganza, Wumv' agumy' agwa!
N' ituro rya Yesu, Ryo mu twana twe.

Ubu turi bato, Niyo dufite;
Ubwo tuzakura, Tuzasumbyaho.

Nitugira bike, Tukwihe Mwami.
Byos' uzabyakira, Utwikirize.

Urukundo rwa Yesu, Rwageze kuri twebwe;
Rudukuraho rwose, Urubanza rwo gupfa.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Aradukunda, Aradukunda,
Aradukunda, Yesu Mutabazi.

Abatari bahabwa, Ubugingo bw' iteka,
Twihute tubabwire, Urukundo rwa Yesu.

Kuko yaradukunze, Yadupfiriye twese,
Natwe dukunde dutyo, Abakiri mu byaha.

Aho Yes' azazira, Aje kwim' ingoma ye,
Ni bwo tuzumv' ijwi rye, Ati: Mwakoze neza.

Akir' uyu mutima, Weze maz' ub' uwawe,
Wambambiwe ku giti, Nzagukunda mb' uwawe.

Mbonez' intoke zanjye, Zibonere rwose;
Ko nazihaye Yesu, Ngo zimukorere.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Nitondesh' intambwe,
Aho njya hose.
Ne kuyobok' undi,
Keretse Yesu.

Nteg' amatwi ngo numve, Nez' umunsi wose.
Nkor' ibikwiye numva, Ntagir' icyo mpuga.

Mpang' amabokw' amaso, Ngo ndeb' iby' akora;
Nyabuze kwenderanya, Akorere Yesu.

Njye nsingiz' urukundo, Nirwo rumbwiriza,
Kugirir' abandi neza, Bakamenya Yesu.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Data we ko nd' umwana wawe!
Data we Ngukurikize!
Njye nsingiz' urukundo,
Nirwo rumbwiriza,
Kugirir' abandi neza, Bakamenya Yesu.

Iyi s' ibamw' ishavu, N' ibyaha n' urupfu;
Ntibimbuza kuyobora, bamw' ibwami bwawe.

Maz' ibyo nibishira, Tuzabe mw' ijuru,
Tuzajye tuguhimbaza, Mwami w' urukundo.

Yemwe ngabo z' Umwami! Nimutabare!
Tujyane na Yesu! Niw' utabaza.
Twitwaz' umusaraba! Utujy' imbere!
Mwese nimuze tugabe! Tunesh' Umwanzi.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Yemwe ngabo z' Umwami mwese!
Dutabare twese! Tujyane na Yesu,
Dutsind' Umwanzi.

Ababisha bahunga, Babony' intwari.
Nimuze tuneshe, Ngabo z' Umwami!
Intangiriro z' isi zinyeganyezwa,
N' ibyishimo by' ab' Umwami, bamusingiza.

Itorero ry' Imana, Rirafatanya;
Rirahaguruka, Kunesh' Umwanzi.
Nta kizaduteranya, Turakundana,
Duhora duhuj' inama, Twizera kimwe.

Nta ngoma zidashira, Zirahanguka.
Arikw' itorero, Rizahoraho.
Ukuzimu n' urupfu, Ntibiririnda.
Twarazwe na Yesu Kristo, Ntabw' ahemuka.

Nuko mugabe mwese! Tugerereze.
Tubumbire hamwe, Amajwi yacu,
Turirimbe dushima, Umwami Yesu,
Kukw' afit' icyubahiro, Giheranije.

Ba mas' udacumura! Ibyaha bigota,
Bihora bikwegera cyane, Ng' utajya mw' ijuru.

Ba maso rwana senga! Nturek' urugamba!
Ururasany' iminsi yose, Utabaz' Imama.

Komeza nturanesha! Wirekur' intwaro!
Dor' intambara ntirashira, Udahaw' ikamba.

Huguka mutima wanjye! Shishikarir' ibyiza!
Ukomez' urwan' ishyaka! Uzambikw' ikamba.

N' Iman' iguhamagara, Gira bwangu witabe!
Niy' iziher' ibihembo, Abatsinze bose.

Inteko zikurebera, Ziragutegereje,
Ntutekerez' ah' uvuye, Reb' imbere yawe.

Mukiza wacu dukunda, Twanesheje ku bwawe,
Ubu twaje kugushima, Turagusingiza.

Ndeger' umusaraba, Naniwe nkennye mpumye,
Singir' icyo nitaho, Rwose nshaka gukizwa.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Mwami ndakwizigira,
Mukiza wanjye mwiza!
Ndicuz' imbere yawe,
Mwami Yes' unkiz’'ubu!

Nakwifujije kera, Njya mbabazwa n' ibyaha.
Yes' ambwira nez' ati: Ngukiz' ibicumuro.

Ubu ndakwihereje, Simbuzwa n' iby' iyi si.
Mb' uwawe rwose Mwami, Nguhay' ibyanjye byose.

Ndiringir' iby' uvuga, Wamviriy' amaraso.
Ubu ndicuza cyane, Mbambanywe n' Umukiza.

Nezezwa n' uko nkize, Yesu niw' unkomeza.
Nta nenge nsigaranye, Mp' itam' icyubahiro.

Mwami mp' umugisha wawe, Uhera bos' ubusa.
Ndakwinginga ntumpiteho! Arik' umpire none.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content: Umpire! Umpire! Ngo ntatahan' ubusa.

Ntunsige mubyeyi mwiza, Ibyaha byandembeje;
Nkwiriye gucibwa rwose, Arik' umbabarire.

Niba natinze mu byaha, Njya nkubabaza, cyane;
Niba ngoswe n' iby' iyi si, Ubinkuremo rwose.

Ntumpiteho Mwuka Wera! Niw' uhumur' impumyi.
Unyemez' uhamya Yesu! Mbwir' ibimpumuriza.

Untambe hejuru Mwuka Wera, Ngo mpirwe nawe!
Nyuzuz' umugisha wawe, Ngwino ngwin' unyuzure!

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Nyuzura! nyuzura! Yesu ngwin' unyuzure!
Nyuzuz' umugisha wawe! Ngwino ngwin' unyuzure!

Ushobora kunyuzura, Ariko sinz' uburyo.
Ndagushaka Mwuka Wera, Ngwino ngwin' unyuzure!

Sinkomeye ndababaye, Ndunam' imbere yawe.
Mwuka mwiza wo mw' ijuru, Mp' urukundo nyuzura.

Ngwin' unyeze kand' unkize! Tuz' umutima wanjye!
Niw' umpumuriz' unkiza, Unyuzure rwos' ubu.

Ndagushak' iteka, Mwami mwiza cyane.
Ijwi ryawe ryiza, Rizan' amahoro.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Ku manywa na n' ijoro,
Ndagushak' iteka.
Mpir' ubu Mukiza we!
Twigumanire.

Ndagushak' iteka, Jy' ungum' iruhande.
Ntsind' amoshya yose, Iyo turi kumwe.

Ndagushak' iteka, Ntuje n' iyo nganya.
Ngwin' ubu tubane! Mbone gutungana.

Ndagushak' iteka, Nyigish' iby' ushaka!
Nkwinging' unsohorez' amasezerano!

Ndagushak' iteka, Mwami Wera rwose,
Nyobora mb' uwawe, Wowe munyahirwe!

Yesu nd' uwawe nyakira, N' ibyanjye mfite byose!
Njye ngukunda nkwizigire, Nkomeze nkuyoboke.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Nguhaye byose, Nguhaye byose.
Mucunguzi wanjye mwiza, Nguhaye byose.

Yesu nd' uwawe nyakira! Niyoroshye nkuramye.
Mpaz' ibyishimo byo hasi, Ubu Yesu nyakira!

Yesu nd' uwawe nyakira! Mukiza ngir' uwawe!
Tum' Umwuka Wer' ambwire, Kuko naw' ur' uwanjye!

Yesu nguhaye byos' ubu, Umwuk' ampay' umwete!
Nsingiz' imbabazi zawe, Nkuramye bihimbaje.

Ubu nj' uko ndi nta kindi cyankiza.
Ndokoresh' amaraso yawe.
Nitaby' ijwi ryawe rimpamagaye,
Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.

Nj' uko ndi nyakir' ubu ngubu Yesu!
Nyez' umutima nkir' ibyaha!
Wowe Nyir' amaras' akiza rwose,
Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.

Nj' uko ndi mbuyerezwa n' ubugome.
Njya nanizwa nuko nd' intebyi,
Mfit' ibindwanya byinshi bincogoza,
Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.

Nj' uko ndi nd' umuhanya, ndi n' impumyi.
Gutungana mbikesha wowe,
Ibyamboneza nabibon' iwawe.
Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.

Nj' uko ndi nizigiye k' unyakira,
Nizey' isezerano ryawe;
Yuk' uzankiza kand' uzamboneza.
Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.

Nj' uko ndi guhamy' urukundo rwawe,
Ko rwambohoy' ingoyi zose.
Uherey' ubu mbay' uwawe rwose.
Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.

Dushim' Imana kubw' Umwana wayo,
Kubw' Umukiza waducunguye twese.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Haleluya Nyirigira, Haleluy' amina;
Haleluya Nyirigira, Twonger' umwete.

Dushim' Imana kubw' Umwuka Wera;
Atubwiriza kumvir' Iyaturemye.

Dushim' Intama yatambwe ku bwacu,
Yatway' ibyaha byac' adukiza rwose.

Dushimir' Iman' imbabazi zayo,
Yaratuguz' itugir' abana bayo.

Twonger' umwete, Twuzuz' urukundo;
Umuntu wes' akuyobokan' ubwira.

Shaka gutungana, Akuyobore.
Ty' itond' imbere ye, N' ugir' ibyago,
Uk' umera kose, Jy' umwiyambaza.
Jy' uyoboka Yesu, Mwumvire rwose.

Shaka gutungana, Tuz' umutima.
Tekerez' ibyiza, Wihutiraho.
Jya wumvir' Umwuka, Gwiz' urukundo;
Uzatunganira, Kuba mw' ijuru.

Ungumane ko bugiye kwira,
Haj' umwijima Mwam' ungumane.
Ubwo bagenzi banjye bansiga,
Nkaba jyenyine, Mwam' ungumane.

Mwami niwe nshak' iteka ryose,
Nta moshya ntsinda tutari kumwe.
Nta wabasha kunyobora nkawe.
Mwam' iteka ryose, ungumane.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Wera, Wera, Wera, Mwam' Imana.
Wigwij' ahantu hose,
Nta kitaguh' ishimwe, Mwam' Imana.

Duhe kukwiringira, Ng' ubwo tuzapfa Mwami,
Twongere kubon' umucyo, Ijoro rishir' iteka,
Tugushime.

Mukiza we! Niwe mucyo waka.
Ntabw' umwijim' uhangar' ah' uri,
Nyamururahw' ibinyoshya,
Bituma nanduranya nawe.

Mukiza mu gihe njya kuryama,
Ngo nduhuk' imirimo nakoze,
Umpe kugutekereza,
Ngo nsinzire ndi kumwe nawe.

N' ubwo nkanguk' ungume bugufi;
N' aho ndibujye gukora hose,
Kugez' ubwo nzaz' iwawe,
Meny' urukundo rwawe rwose.

Yesu n' urutare rwacu, N' ubwugamo bw' umugaru;
Niw' udukiz' amakuba, N' ubwugamo bw' umugaru.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Rutare rwisungwa n' abantu!
Gicucu cy' uburuhukiro!
Muyobozi mwiz' utayobya!
Ubwugamo bw' umugaru.

Ankiz' amakub' iteka, N' ubwugamo bw' umugaru.
Ntacyo ntinya turi kumwe, N' ubwugamo bw' umugaru.

Imivu n' isum' itera, N' ubwugamo bw' umugaru.
N' Umukiza wacu mwiza, N' ubwugamo bw' umugaru.

Rutare rwiza rushimwa! Ubwugamo bw' umugaru!
Jy' utuvuna mu makuba! Ubwugamo bw' umugaru.

Ndanezerwa kw' anyobora, Arampumurish' Ijambo rye.
Mu byo nkora, n' aho ngenda, N'ukoboko kwa Yesu kunyobora.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Aranyobora nkanezerwa,
N' ukw' anyoboresh' ukuboko kwe.
Nshaka kumukorera neza,
Yuk' ukuboko kwe kunyobora.

Niba ngir' ishavu ryinshi, Cyangwa nubwo nezerwa cyane.
Mu mahoro n' amakuba, N' ukuboko kwa Yesu kunyobora.

Mwami nshaka ko tubana; Ntabwo nzinuba nitotomba;
Nzagumya nishime cyane, K' ukuboko kwa Yesu kunyobora.

Ndangij' imirimo yanjye, Nesheje kubw' imbabazi ze;
Ntacyo nzatinya n' urupfu, K' ukuboko kwa Yesu kunyobora.

Nimbon' amahoro yomboka nk' uruzi, Naho naba mfit' ishavu,
Uko mba kose, Njya nkunda kuvuga Nti: Nguwe neza mu mutima.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Ni neza (ni neza) ndatuje (ndatuje);
Ko nguwe neza mu mutima.

Satani n' antera, Nkagira n' ibyago, Nkomezwa no kwiringira,
Kuko Kristo yabonye ko nd' intebyi; Ni ko kumvir' amaraso ye.

Nshima cyane kuko mbabariw' ibyaha, Nta na kimwe cyasigaye;
Byabambanywe nawe ku musaraba; Mutima wanjye shim' Umwami.

Mwami tebuts' umuns' uzagarukaho, Ubw' ibicu bizarundwa,
Impand' ivuze, Umwam' amanuke Nti: Nguwe neza mu mutima.

Nkund' ubucuti buva mw' ijuru, Nisung' amaboko y' iteka.
Ngiz' amahirwe, mbony' amahoro, Nisunz' amaboko y' iteka.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
S. na A.:

Nkiza! Nkiza! Ndokor' amakuba yose!
Nkiza! Nkiza! Nisunz' amaboko y' iteka.

T. na B.:

Nkiza Yesu! Nkiza Yesu nkiza!
Ndokor' amakuba yose!
Nkiza Yesu! Nkiza Yesu nkiza!
Nisunz' amaboko y' iteka.

Nezerwa n' uko Yes' anyobora; Nisung' amaboko y' iteka.
Nunguk' ishimwe, Ngakiranuka; Nisunz' amaboko y' iteka.

Nta bwoba mfite, Nshiz' agahinda, Nisunz' amaboko y' iteka.
Nguwe nez' ubu, Ndatunganiwe. Nisunz' amaboko y' iteka.

Ni wowe nizeye, Ntama y' i Kalwari,
We Mukiza! Ngusab' unyumvire,
Nkiz' ibicumuro, Mperey' ubu Mwami,
Nkuyoboke.

Nyuzuz' imbabazi, Ngir' inama nziza,
Nter' umwete; Kuko wampfiriye,
Nkwerek' urukundo, Rudatuba rwaka,
Nk' umuriro.

Ni ngotwa n' ibyaha, Nkagira n' ishavu,
Unyobore. Nkura mu mwijima,
Ntsembahw' amaganya, Kandi ntundekere,
Kure yawe.

Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkuyoboke.
N' aho natendekwa ku musaraba,
Naba nkiririmba: Nkuyoboke Mwami,
Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkube bugufi.

Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkuyoboke.
Mu makuba yose, Mpagarikira!
Ni nterwa n' ibyago, Umpe kwihangana,
Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkube bugufi.

Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkuyoboke.
Jy' untabar' iteka ngumye nkwizere!
Umwanzi n' antera, Ujy' undwanirira!
Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkube bugufi.

Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkuyoboke.
Wakinguy' ijuru, Nyobor' ah' uri.
Mugenzi komera, Urenda gukira!
Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkube bugufi.

Unambe ku Mana, ntuyimure; Bona n' uterwa n' impagarara,
Uzagarukirwa na Rutare, Iyo tugoswe n' ibyaha.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Dukomerera kuri Kristo Rutare,
Niwe Rutare twisunga.
Nitwihangana tuzab' amahoro,
Tugez' imbere y' Imana.

Nambir' ukuri jya wihangana, Komez' ubutwari no kwizera!
Rutar' aduha kuganziriza, Mur' iy' isi y' igomero.

Nambir' ukuri birakwiriye, We kurambirw' uzagororerwa.
Rutare niw' uduh' amahoro, Tumaze gutsind' ibyago.

Nkomeze njye niringira, Amaraso y' Umukiza.
Sinagir' undi nigana, Keretse Yesu wenyine.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Umwijima n' umpumisha, Niringir' imbabazi ze.
Mu makuba no mu byago, Ntagir' ubw' anzibukira.

Mbonezwa n' amaraso ye, Ampa kumukurikira.
Niyo nababaye rwose, Aramfasha ngakomera.

N' aza kw' ijwi ry' ikondera, Azasanga mwiteguye;
Nambaye gukiranuka, Nta nenge nzaba ngifite.

Tubane n' Umwami, Twumvir' ijambo rye;
Atujyana mu nzira nziza,
Tumwumviye rwose. Akabana natwe,
N' abamwizer' uko bangana.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Jy' umwumvira, Nta kandi gakiza,
Keretse Yesu gusa; Mwizigire rwose.

Ntihakingirizwa, Nta gicu gikuba,
Byeyurwa no kumwenyura kwe.
Nta shiti n' ubwoba, Bona n' igishyika,
Bimarwa n' uko tumwizeye.

Ntabwo twiyungura, Kugir' ibyishimo,
Kugeza ko tureka byose,
Kubw' imbabazi ze; Impan' ajy' atanga,
N' ingororano z' abizeye.

Tuzajya twishima, Turi kumwe nawe.
Tuzagendana naw' iteka,
Tumwumvira rwose; Azajy' adutuma,
Ntacyo tuzaba tugitinya.

Yes' abe hamwe nawe hose! Akugir' inama nziza!
Agucyure mu bushyo bwe! Yes' abe hamwe nawe hose!

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Kugez' ubwo (ubwo) tuzabonana,
Ubwo tuzabana na Yesu (na Yesu).
Kugez' ubwo (ubwo) tuzabonana,
Yes' abe hamwe nawe hose.

Yes' abe hamwe nawe hose! Akurinde mu makuba!
Akwongere man' iteka! Yes' abe hamwe nawe hose!

Yes' abe hamwe nawe hose! Ubuyerezwa n' ibyaha,
Agukingir' ukuboko! Yes' abe hamwe nawe hose!

Yes' abe hamwe nawe hose! Jy' uguman' urukundo rwe!
Tsind' urupf' imbere yawe! Yes' abe hamwe nawe hose!

Iyo turi kumwe n' inshuti, Nta kitubabaza,
Arikw' iyo dutandukanye, Tugir' agahinda.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Mw' ijuru ntituzatana, Tuzahahorana.
Mur' iyo si y' amahoro, Ntabwo tuzatana.

Iyo twibuts' inshuti zacu, Turishima cyane.
Nitumar' imirimo yacu, Tuzaban' iteka.

Ntabwo tuzasezeranaho, Tugeze mw' ijuru;
Tuzahahoran' ibyishimo, Turirimb' iteka.

Gupfa twiringiye Yesu,
Kubera n' ugusinzira.
Nta wukangurwamw arira,
Ntaw' umwanz' ashukirayo.

Gusinzira muri Yesu,
N' uburuhukiro bwiza,
N' amahirwe y' abizeye,
Ko bazahabw' ubugingo.

Gusinzira muri Yesu,
No gukangurwamo nawe,
N' imbaraga y' Umukiza;
Ntabw' izabuzwa n' ibyago.

Gusinzira muri Yesu,
Kuzurwa n' ijwi ry' impanda.
Maz' ibituro bivemo,
Abera bose barame.

Ibyo nkora nkirihw' aho bizarangirira, Ubwo kudapfa kuzakura gupfa;
Ni mara gukira nzabon' Umukiza wanjye, Kand' azab' anyakiran' ibyishimo.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Nzamumenya, Nzamumenya; Nzahagarar' imbere Ye nkize.
Nzamumenya, Nzamumenya, Mbony' inkovu zo mu biganza bye.

Nzanezerwa mbony' uburanga bwe buhebuje, N' amaso y' akey' arabagirana;
Nzajya musingiza mpimbawe n' urukundo rwe, Ko yambonerej' aheza mw' ijuru.

Ntabwo mpug' abadusezeyeho bajya kure, Ubwo twatandukaniye ku cyambu.
Ni tujya mw' ijuru nta kizadutandukanya, Cyane nifuza kubon' Umukiza.

Azanjyana mu mudugudu utabamw' ishavu, Niho nzambarir' imyambaro yera,
Nzaririmbana n' aber' indirimbo ya Mose; Cyane ndifuza kubon' Umukiza.

Umpe Bibiliya kukw' ari y' inezeza, Uyinyoboresh' iteka Mwami.
Nta kibasha kuzimy' umucyo wayo, Ko Yesu yaje kuyitwumvisha.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Umpe Bibiliya kukw' ariy' inezeza,
Nyoborwe nayo mu nzira ntoya.
Amategeko yawe niyo meza,
Agaragaz' inzira y' ukuri.

Umpe Bibiliya mu kababaro kanjye, Igihe mpigwa n' ibyaha byanjye.
Umpe n' amagambo Yesu yavuze, Kukw' ariyo mez' ampumuriza.

Umpe Bibiliya ngw' imurikir' iteka; Kand' indind' imitego yo hasi;
Niyo rumuri rwaka mu mwijima, Runyerek' inzira y' amahoro.

Umpe Bibiliya ngw' imbwir' iby' ubugingo, Kand' udukomerez' uwo mucyo.
Ngo tumeny' inzir' igana mw' ijuru, Unyerek' ubwiza bwawe Data.

Jy' uhor' undinganirije, Amagamb' atunganye.
Umpugure meny' ukuri, Kw' amagambo yawe.
Nkund' amagambo yawe, Kw' ampa kukwizigira.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Amagambo meza cyane, Anter' ibyishimo byinshi;
Niyo meza, ndayakunda; Ntabw' atanezeza.

Krist' ahet' abantu bose, Amagamb' atunganye.
Nimwitabe banyabyaha! Mwumv' iby' ubugingo!
Abayoboz' ituza, N' amagamb' atunganye.

Menyesha bos' ubutumwa! N' amagamb' atunganye!
Nimuze mubabarirwe! Mwumv' iby' ubugingo!
Yesu niwe Mukiza, Utwonger' ubugingo.

Mpagaze ku nkengero ya Yor'dani nubur' amaso,
Ndor' igihugu cyiza cy' i Kanani, nihw' ibyanjye biri.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
N' igihugu cyiza cy' amahoro,
Hakurya ku nkengero haratoshye;
Tuzahavugir' indirimbo ya Mose,
Tubane na Yes' iteka.

Hakurya mur' ibyo bibaya, Hahor' umucy' iteka.
Yesu Kristo niw' uzahaber' umucy' ahakur' ijoro.

Aho heza nzahagera ryari ngo mpabe mpiriwe?
Nzareba Data mu maso ryari nduhukiy' ibwami bwe?

Mfit' ibyishimo mu mutima, Sinshaka kugum' aha.
Yor' dan' isumira hos' ariko ntinyuka kuyambuka.

Tuzishim' imirim' ishize, Abasarurir' Imana,
Bashohoj' umusaruro, I Yerusalemu nshya.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Ishimwe hazabahw' ishimwe,
Ntabw' ishimwe rizahashira,
Umunsi w' ishimw' uri hafi,
Duteranir' iwacu.

Tuzishima no kuririmba, Tuzajya dushima Kristo.
Tuzamuhimbariza rwos' i Yerusalemu nshya.

Tuzahishimira by' ukuri, Tuzaba mu mazu yera;
Yesu yaduteguriye, I Yerusalemu nshya.

Ntabwo ndatekereza, Kw' iwac' ari bugufi.
Uko bukeye negereza, Gusohora mw ijuru.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Ku rurembo rwa Data, Hariy' amazu menshi;
Yateguriy' abera bose, Ngo babane na Yesu.

Ninjya kuger' iwacu, Nzururuts' umutwaro;
Nzoroherwa n' umubabaro, Nambar' ikamba ryiza.

Ningera ku nkengero, Nzaba ngeze bugufi;
Nzaba negerey' i muhira, Ngiye kuger' iwacu.

Har' igihugu cyiza cyane, Twasezeraniwe n' Imana;
Tugitegereze twizera, Ko Dat' akitubonereza.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Aheza (aheza) mw' ijuru (mw' ijuru),
Tuzahurirayo bagenzi.
Aheza (aheza) mw' ijuru (mw' ijuru),
Tuzahurirayo bagenzi.

Tuzaririmbira mw' ijuru, Indirimbo z' abanyahirwe.
Ntituzongera kubabara, Tuzaba dushiz' agahinda.

Tuzasingiza Data cyane, Ku mbabazi yatugiriye,
No ku buntu bw' urukundo rwe, N' umugisha yatwungukiye.

Tubatirishe Umwuka Wera,
Mukiza twegere, duh' urukundo.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo 1, 2, 3
hymnContent.content:
Ubu Mwami Yesu turakwinginga,
Tubatirish' Umwuka, Duh' urukundo.

Turatakamba, Twazize byinshi,
Udukiz' utweze, Twishwe n' ibyaha.

Mwuka Wera we, Tumanukire!
Duhire rwos' ubu, Duh' imbabazi.

Ngir' ijwi ryiza, Ryavuze riti:
Ur' Umwana wanjye, ni wowe nkunda.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo 4
hymnContent.content:
Turagusingiza, turakuramya
Turaguhimbaz' ubu, Mwami Amina.

Ngwino soko y' umugisha, Mp' umutim' ugushima.
Migez' idakama myiza, Tugusingize cyane.
Unyigishe kukuramy' iteka, Kandi meny' ubwiza bwawe.
Kwiringir' ubwami bwawe, Kunyuzuz' urukundo.

Nshyirahw' icyibutso cyanjye, Niho ngeze kubwawe.
Ndizeye yuk' uzanjyana, Nger' iwaw' amahoro.
Yesu yantaruye nazimiye, Nari ndi kure y' Imana;
Ashaka kunkiz' urupfu, Yatanz' ubugingo bwe.

Ndimw' ubwishyu bwawe Mwami, Bw' imbabaz' ungiriye.
Nyigiza bugufi bwawe, Meny' urukundo rwawe.
Ngoswe n' ibingerageza byinshi, Ngo ndek' iyo Mana nkunda.
Akir' umutima wanjye Undinde nkire rwose.

Mwuka Wera Muyobozi, Ube hafi y' abakristo!
Mfat' ukuboko nyobora, Nd' umugenzi ku gahinga.
Abananiwe bishima, Ubwo bumv' ijwi ryiza,
Ribabwira: Bagenzi mwe, Nimuze mbagez' iwanyu!

Ntuduhemukir' iteka, Ntabwo wanga kudufasha.
Dukomeze tukwizere, Dukabakabe hijimye.
Amakuba n' aboneka, Imitima nikuka,
Ijwi riti: Bagenzi mwe, Nimuze mbagez' iwanyu!

Tumaz' imirimo yacu, Dutegereze gukizwa,
Dusigarany' iby' ijuru, Twibaze ko twanditsweyo.
Twikingir' ibidutera, No kwiringira Yesu.
Ijwi riti: Bagenzi mwe, Nimuze mbagez' iwanyu!

Harihw' icyo nkwaka Mwami,
Nubwo mpora ngucumuraho,
Unyejeshe, unyejeshe!
Amazi cyangw' umuriro.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Mpanagurwe hose Mwami!
N' umuriro nib' ushaka.
Nkir' ibyaha, birimburwe.
Nkir' ibyaha, birimburwe.

N' untunganiriz' ubwenge,
Nzanezerwa nzagusingiza;
Arik' umutima wera,
Urutaho, urutaho.

Ninezw' umutima wanjye,
Niho nzunguk' ubwenge bwose,
Mbubwirijwe nawe Mwami,
Bwo mw' ijuru, bwo mw' ijuru.

Njya nirind' ibicumuro,
Nkitonder' ibyo ntekereza.
Mwami n' ibyo nkora byose,
Ntabwo nera, Ntabwo nera.

Har' ubwo wasanze Yesu ng' ukire? Se wuhagijw' amaraso ye?
Ubu wizeye rwos' imbabazi ze? Se wuhagijw' amaraso ye?

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Wogejwe (wogejwe) na Yesu (na Yesu)?
Watunganijwe n' amaraso (maraso)?
Har' ubwo yakwuhagij' amaraso?
Mbes' imyambaro yaw' irera?

Mbes' ugendana na Yesu iteka? Se wuhagijw' amaraso ye?
Mbes' ujy' ubana n' uwari wabambwe? Se wuhagijw' amaraso ye?

Umukwe n' az' uzab' umwiteguye? Se wuhagijw' amaraso ye?
Mbes' uzakundirwa kujya mw' ijuru? No gukizwa n' amaraso ye?

Hung' ibyaha jy‘ ukor' ibitunganye! Wejeshw' amaraso ya Yesu!
Har' isokw' itemb' ikiz' imitima, Wejeshw' amaraso ya Yesu!

Nahabiye kure y' Imana, Ndahabuts' ubu.
Nari naratinze mu byaha, Noneho ndaje.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Reka nze, reka nze! Ntabwo nzongera.
Nyemerer' umbabarire! Mwami nyakira!

Narapfapfany' imyaka myinshi, Ndahabuts' ubu.
Ndakwitwaraho cyane nkiza, Noneho ndaje.

Ndembejwe n' ibyaha no kugwa, Ndahabuts' ubu.
Niringiy' urukundo rwawe, Noneho ndaje.

Yesu yamviriy' amaraso, Ndahabuts' ubu.
Ubwe niwe wankiza gusa, Noneho ndaje.

Wumv' amaganya yanjy' unkize, Ndahabuts' ubu.
Nyeza Mwami nse n' urubura, Noneho ndaje.

Bayoboke nimurangurure, Mwamamaz' ubutumwa mw' isi yose!
Nimukwiz' ayo makuru mu bantu! Abashaka nibaze.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Uwemey' aze! Uwemey' aze!
Nimubimenyesh' abatuye hasi!
Umubyey' aratarur' abana be,
Abashaka nibaze.

Ushaka kuza yitindiganya, Niyinjir' irembo riruguruye.
Umwami niwe nzira y' ubugingo, Abashaka nibaze.

Ushaka wese n' agire bwangu! Kand' agir' ubutwari yihangane.
Ushaka wes' azahabw' ubugingo, Abashaka nibaze.

Jy' uganza Mwami w' iteka, Bose bakuramye!
Nimuzan' ikamba ry' ubwami bwe, Ab' Umwami wa bose!
Nimuzan' ikamba ry' ubwami bwe, Kw' ariwe Mwami wa bose.

Batowe mwe b' Israeli, Mwa nkehwe mwe nkeya,
Muramy' ubakirish' imbabazi, Ab' Umwami wa bose!
Muramy' ubakirish' imbabazi, Kw' ariwe Mwami wa bose.

Amoko yose yo hasi, N' imiryango yose,
Bose bajye bamwubaha cyane! Ab' Umwami wa bose.
Bose bajye bamwubaha cyane! Kw' ariwe Mwami wa bose.

Muze tumuririmbire, Tumupfukamire,
Tumusingize no kumushima, Ab' Umwami wa bose.
Tumusingize no kumushima, Kw' ariwe Mwami wa bose.

Yesu mukunzi wanjye, Mpa kuguhungiraho.
Ubw' umurab' usuma, N' umugar' ugwa cyane,
Umpishe Mukiza we! Kugez' ah' uhitira.
Unyobor' ahikinze, Nuk' unkiz' unyakire!

Nta bundi buhungiro, Mwam' unyirokorere!
Ntunzibukire rwose, Komez' ujy' undengera!
Nkwizigire wenyine! Ni wow' ump' imbaraga,
Uhashy' abanzi banjye, Simpugane na hato.

Ngushime Mwami Yesu, K' utagir' icy' unyima,
Usindagiz' urushye, N' urway' uramukiza;
Urera bihebuje, Ntabwo ngutunganiye,
Ndi mubi bikabije, Wow' urakiranutse.

Ubabarira cyane, Kand' imbabazi zawe,
Zirut' ibyaha byanjye. Nyeza nkomeze nere,
We soko y' ubugingo! Nkundira nkuvomemo!
Unyuzur' umutima, Nzagere ku bugingo.

Yes' utunezeza twese,
Soko y' ubuging' ur' umucyo w' abantu;
Ibyishimo byose byo hasi,
Tubicitseho tugukurikire.

Tuvune turakwisunze.
Ukuri kwawe ntikugir' impinduka;
Dutabare turakwizeye,
Tukwiyeguriye tumaramaje.

Mutsima w' ubugingo we!
Dushaka guhazwa naw' iteka ryose.
Soko nziz' idakam' iteka!
Tumar' inyota mu mitima yacu!

Mu midugararo yacu,
Tukwifuz' iteka, Mwami mwiza rwose.
Tunezerwa cyan' umwenyuye;
N' amahirwe yac' ubwo duhorana.

Yesu bana natw' iteka!
Duh' amahoro twishim' iteka ryose!
Dukiz' ibibi bitugota!
Murika kw is' umucyo wawe wera!

Nkunda kunguk' ibya Yesu, Kwerekan' imbabazi ze;
Kwunguk' ubwenge bw' ukuri, N' urukundo rw' Umukiza.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Nunguk' ibya Yesu, Nunguk' ibya Yesu.
Kwunguk' ubwenge bw' ukuri,
N' urukundo rw' Umukiza.

Nshishikarir' ibya Yesu, Mmeny' iby' ashaka binkwiye,
Mwuka Wera mfuturira! Mbwir' uko Yesu yankunze!

Nunguk' ijambo rya Yesu, Mbane n' Umwam' antoneshe;
Numvir' iby' ambwira byose, Mpuze nawe muyoboke.

Meny' iby' ingoma ya Yesu, Menye n' ubwiza bwe bwose,
Menye n' ukw' agiye kwima, Niwe Mwami w' amahoro.

Yesu ndagukunze rwose, Ndakwihaye.
Ingeso mbi zose, Nzanz' uko zingana.
Ni wowe Mukiza wanjye mwiza, Nkuyoboke.
Ntabwo nigeze kugukunda, Nk' ubu ngubu.

Ndagukunze kuko wabanje, Kunkunda,
Waranyiguriy' unkiriz' i Kalwari.
Ngukundiy' ikamba ry' amahwa, Wahambikiwe,
Ntabwo nigeze kugukunda, Nk' ubu ngubu.

Mperey' ubu ngukunda, Nzageza gupfa.
Nzajya ngusingiz' iteka Ngihumeka;
Nah' urupfu ruzanyegurira, Nzavuga nti:
Ntabwo nigeze kugukunda, Nk' ubu ngubu.

Ubwo nzager' aho, Waduteguriye,
Nzajya mpaguhamiriz' itek' iteka.
Nzaguhimbaza nambay' ikamba, Ritunganye;
Ntabwo nigeze kugukunda, Nk' ubu ngubu.

N' iki cyankiz' ibyaha? N' amaraso yawe Yesu.
N' iki cyanyeza rwose? N' amaraso yawe Yesu.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Maras' atunganye, Niy' amboneza rwose.
Nta cyampa gukira, Nk' amaraso y' Umukiza.

Nta kindi cyantunganya, N' amaraso yawe Yesu.
Nta kindi cyiru mfite, N' amaraso yawe Yesu.

Nta cyantsembahw ibyaha, N' amaraso yawe Yesu.
Nta byanjye byamboneza, N' amaraso yawe Yesu.

Ni wowe niringira, N' amaraso yawe Yesu.
Ni wow' ump' amahoro, N' amaraso yawe Yesu.

Njye ngusingiza cyane, Ku maraso yawe Yesu.
Mukiz' urakarama, Ku maraso wamviriye.

S' uhagarikiy' ik' umutima? Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu!
Ubabajwe no kubur' ituza? Ihererane Yesu!

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu!
Niwe nshuti y' ukuri;
Ntugir' indi nshut' ihwanye nawe,
Jy' ubana nawe cyane.

Mbes' ub' urabogoz' amarira? Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu!
Utotezwa n' ibyaha wahishe? Ihererane Yesu!

Ujy' utinya guterwa n' ibyago? Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu!
Mbes' ub' uraganyishwa n' iby' ejo? Ihererane Yesu!

Mbes' ujy' ugir' ubwoba bwo gupfa? Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu!
Mbes' urashak' ingoma ya Kristo? Ihererane Yesu!

Nkunda kwiringira Yesu, Nkajya mwumvira rwose,
No kwizer' umurage we, N' amateka y' Imana.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Nkoyoboke Mwami rwose;
Najyaga nshidikanya,
Yesu Yesu mwiza nkunda,
Mfasha nkwumvire rwose!

Nkunda kwiringira Yesu; Nkizwa n' amaraso ye.
Ansendahw ibicumuro, Niy' antunganya rwose.

Nimenya kumwiringira, Sinzaba ngicumura.
Niho nzagir' ubuhoro, N' ubugingo bw' iteka.

Mpimbawe no kukumenya, Yesu Mukiza nkunda.
Nizeye k' umpora hafi, Nuko nguman' iteka.

Nshim' umunsi nakwemeye, Mwami Yesu Mukiza we!
Nshima cyane n' umutima, Ndabwiriz' ibinezeza.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Biramaze, napfiriwe, Nd' uwa Yesu wandokoye;
Yangiz' uwe, Nkurikire, Nshima yuko ntowe nawe.

Mutima wanjye ruhuka; Reba mw ijur' ahejejwe,
Ntugasig' Umwami wawe, Bana nawe mwumvikane.

Iteka nzagukorera, Iby' isi ndabizinutswe.
Nkugarutseho noneho, Sinzarorera kwishima.

Ubw' umucyo wo mw' ijuru uzamurikir' iyi si.
Nsanganir' Umwami wanjye, Tuzibanire mw' ijuru.

Abatoni b' Umwami! Nimuze dusakaze hos' umunezero wacu,
Turangururire rimwe, Dukikij' intebe, Dukikij' intebe.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Turajy' i Siyoni, Ku murwa mwiz' utunganye.
Turajy' i Siyoni, Ku murwa mwiz' utunganye w' Imana.

Murek' ibyigomeke, Byanga gushim' Umwami. Arikw' abana b' Imana,
Arikw' abana b' Imana, Muhore mwishima, Muhore mwishima.

Twishimir' i Siyoni, N' umudugudu wera; Tuzahahurira twese,
Tuzahahurira twese. Hazahor' ituza, Hazahor' ituza.

Turirimbe cyan' ubu, Hataba n' umw' urira. Tugiye kuger' iwacu,
Tugiye kuger' iwacu, Mu gihugu cyiza, Mu gihugu cyiza.

Naguzw' amaraso y' Intama, Ncunguzw' imbabazi zayo.
Ubu nd' umwana wayo rwose, Ntaho ntazabyamamaza.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Nkiza (nkiza), nkiza (nkiza),
N' amaraso yawe Yesu.
Mboneza, mboneza!
Nd' umwana wawe rwos' ubu.

Mpimbaze Yesu wankijije, Nta wuz' uko nezerewe.
Niwe mucyo mwiz' unyobora, Ahorana nanjy' iteka.

Ntabwo mpung' Umukiza wanjye, Njya mutekerez' iteka.
Ntabwo ndambirwa kumurata, Njya nsingiz' urukundo rwe.

Nzi ko nzamubonan' ubwiza, Nezerwa n' amateka ye.
Andinda nez' aho njya hose, Mmutaramira ndirimba.

Nizeye kw' ambikiy' ikamba, Mu rugo rwe rwo mw' ijuru.
Maze tuzahoran' iteka, N' abamuyobotse bose.

Tuzaramban' amazi yera, Y' isokw' ibeshaho.
Niho Yes' azadutegera, N' ihuriro ryiza.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Tuzaramban' amazi yera,
Kuramban' amazi yera,
Kuramban' amazi yera,
Tuzatinda kw isoko.

Imirimo n' iducogoza, Turuhuke hato!
Ku mazi y' urubogobogo, Ku masoko meza.

Tyo nimuze mwisunge Kristo! Abah' imbaraga,
Kandi mumeny' ubury' akiza! Munywe mwic' inyota!

Igihe Yes' azakorany' amoko, Ngw' ahagarar' imbere Ye,
Twese tuzagenzwa dute mu manza, Dutumiwe gutegekwa?

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Azahunik' ingano mu bigega,
Arik' umuram' azawusesa.
Twese tuzagenzwa dute mu manza,
Z' uwo munsi wo kuzurwa?

Nind' uzumv' Umukiz' amubwir' ati: Ur' umugaragu mwiza?
Cyangw' uzamarwa n' ubwob' ubwiwe ngo: Hoshi genda ndaguciye?

Azamwenyur' abonany' abana be, Icyitegererezo Cye,
Azabambik' ibyiza byo mw' ijuru, Ubwo bamupfukamire.

Tube maso dutegerez' Umwami, N' imuri zigumye zake!
Kugira ng' Umukwe n' az' azasange, Tumaze kumwitegura.

Tujye dutekerez' ibyo mw' ijuru, Urugendo nirushira,
Tuzahagarar' imbere y' Imana, Niba tutagamburura.

Sinita ku butunzi, Feza na zahabu. Ndashak' ibyo mw' ijuru; Nzajyane n' abera.
Yesu Mukiza mbwira: Igitabo cyawe, Cyera cy' ubwami bwawe, Mbese nanditswemo?

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Mbese nanditswemo, Ku mpapuro zera?
Mu gitabo cy' ubwami, Mbese nanditswemo?

Ibyaha byanjye Mwami, Birut' umusenyi. Ngwino Mwam' ubinkirish' amaraso yawe!
Wadusezeraniye, Yukw ibyaha byacu, Nibisa n' umuhemba, Ng' uzabyeza rwose.

Mu mudugudu mwiza, N' amazu yera de, N' abera bawurimo, Barimban' ibyera,
Nta bibi biwegera, Byakwanduz' ibyiza, Niho hab' amahoro, Mbese nanditswemo?

Har' imanz' ubu; Nta kitarondorwa, Mbese tuzamera dute?
Tugez' imbere y' umucamanza, Abony' ibyo twakoze byose?

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Tuzakizwa n' ik' uwo munsi?
Tuzakizwa n' ik' uwo munsi?
Mbese tuzaba twiringanije?
Cyangwa tuzatsindwa n' ibyaha?

Zatangiriye mu basinziriye, Zizaza no mu bariho.
Tuzasuzumirwa mu byanditswe, Nibyo bizaduhamya rwose.

Tuzavug' iki tugeze mu manza, Ibitabo bibumbuwe,
Umuntu wes' abwirw' imanza ze, Atakibon' umurokora?

Umwami niw' udutumira, Ngw' aduteranye n' ubwoko bwe.
Azasanga tumeze dute, Ahw' azazira?

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Mwana wa Data we tyo se :
Ubw' Umwam' azaza,
Twebwe tuzamera dute? Umwami n' aza?

Tuzatamirizw' amakamba, Uwaducunguye yimitswe,
Tuzahorana naw' iteka, Ahw' azazira.

Nkuk' umuraby' ugaragara, Nikw' azagaragaza byose;
Azerekan' ibyo twakoze, Ahw azazira.

Azishim' ubw' azabon' abe, Bambay' imyambaro yera de.
Nituganza tuzanezerwa, Ahw' azazira.

Ntabwo tuzongera gutana, Abanga kumwumvira bose,
Bazataka no kuboroga, Yes' agarutse.

Mwami ni wowe twiringiye; Twigishe kugutegereza,
Tutazatinya kukubona, Ah' uzazira.

Biba mu gitondo, Imbuto z' ineza!
Jy' ubiba ku manywa n' ikigoroba!
Rindira ko zera! Hazaz' usarura,
Tuzishima cyane, Dutund' imiba.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Dutund' imiba, Dutund' imiba.
Tuzishima cyane, Dutund' imiba.

Bib' izuba riva! Biba mu gitundwe!
Ntugatiny' ibihu, N' imbeho nyinshi!
Maz' umusaruro, N' imirim' ishize,
Tuzishima cyane, Dutund' imiba.

Tugende turira, Tubibir' Umwami,
Niba tubabazwa N' abazimira,
Ubwo tuzahozwa, Tuzakizwa nawe.
Tuzishima cyane, Dutund' imiba.

N' ijwi ry' Umwungeri numva, Ritabariza mw ishyamba;
Kw intama ze zazimiye; Mu bushyo niho zavuye.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Nimuze, nimuze, Tuzikurikire mw ishyamba!
Nimuze, nimuze, Tuzigarurire Yesu!

Dutabar' uwo Mwungeri, Dushakan' izo nzimizi!
Tuzigarure mu bushyo, Niho zikirir' imbeho!

Ziratakira mw' ishyamba, Zigeze habi mu manga.
Umwam' arababwir' ati: Munshakir' intama zanjye!

Kiz' abanyabyaha, Rwaz' abarwayi!
Ubarokor' ibyago n' urupfu!
Habur' abahabye! Byuts' abaguye!
Babwire ko Yes' azi gukiza!

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Kiz' abanyabyaha, Rwaz' abarwayi!
Yes' umunyambabaz' arakiza.

Abamushungera, Nabo ntabanga.
Ategerez' abicuza rwose,
Bahate bihane, Jy' ubasabira!
Nibizer' azabababarira.

Toz' abazimiye! Be kuzuyaza.
Barek' irari ry' ibidakwiye!
Buzur' urukundo, Bagire neza.
Bagarukir' uwabacunguye!

Kiz' abanyabyaha! Biragukwiye.
Umwam' azaguhet' imbaraga,
Bos' ubayobore mu nzira ntoya!
Menyesh' indushyi ko zarokowe!

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Niyo nkunda kwogeza;
Nkize nzaba nkivuga,
Ukw' ab' isi bahoranye,
Impuhwe za Yesu.

Nkunda kwogez' amagambo, Nyabwira n' abayazi,
N' abayakennye nabo, Bose bashaka kuyumva.
Ubwo nzaba mw' ijuru, Ndirimb' indirimbo nshya,
Nay' izab' impimbaye, Nk' amagambo nkunda.

Tujye dusabir' abazimiye, Bahabiye kure y' Imana!
Tubahinduz' ubutumwa bwiza, Bamenye k' Umwam' abakunda!

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
S.,A. na T.:

Tujye hose dusang' abantu bose!
Tugarurir' Iman' abazimiye!
Tubane mu bushyo bw' Umucunguzi,
Yesu watambiy' abanyabyaha.

B.:

Tujye hose ...sang' abantu bose!
Tugarurir' ...man' abazimiye!
Tubane mu ...shyo bw' Umucunguzi,
Yesu watambiy' abanyabyaha.

Tugarurire Yes' abahabye, Intebyi zidafit' intege!
Tuzerek' aho zizakirira, Zimeny' inzira y' ubugingo!

Tugend' uko Yesu yadutoye, Tujye tumuyobok' iteka!
Rwaz' abarwayi byuts' abaguye! Yobor' abahabye kwa Yesu.

Imirim' irez' ahantu hose; N' igihe cyo gusarura.
Ubu n' igihe cyo gusarura, Mu bibaya n' imusozi.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Mwam' oherez' abasaruzi!
Tuvune turagutabaza!
Bohereze baterany' imiba!
Igihe kiracyariho.

Bohereze mu gitondo kare! Ubohereze ku manywa!
N' igih' izuba ryenda kurenga, Bategeke basarure!

Tyo ntumwa y' Umwami gir' umwete! Uterany' ibisarurwa!
Maz' ah' uzarangiriza rwose, Uzishimira mw ijuru!

Dukoran' umwete, dukorer' Imana! Twihute dukurikiz' Umwami wacu!
Ijambo rye niryo riduh' imbaraga; Tugir' umwete mwinshi tumuyoboke!

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Dukore (dukore), dukore (dukore), dukore (dukore),
Dukore (dukore). Twizere (twizere), twitonde (twitonde),
Duhore twitez' Umwami!

Dukoran' umwete! duhaz' abashonje! Tuyobor' abaremby' aho bakirira.
Niko kwamamaz' inkuru y' Umukiza, Dukomeze twiratan' umusaraba.

Dukoran' umwete, dutarure bose! Kukw' ingoma zo hasi zizahanguka.
Kand' Uwitek' azasingizwa na bose, Abera bazaririmba ko bakize.

Dukoran' umwete, Dutebuts' Umwami! Kukw' igihe cy' isarura kiri hafi.
Tujye gutur' iwabo w' abacunguwe, Tuzahora turirimb' uko twakize.

Kor' ugifit' uburyo, Kora hakibona!
Jy' ukora no mu kime, Jy' ushir' ubute!
Kora no ku manyw' akaze! Ntucogore rwose!
Kora bugiye kwira, Mar' imirimo!

Kora bugiye kwira! Kor' amanywa yose!
Komez' ukor' iteka, Ntukaruhuke!
Mu bihe byos' ukiriho, Ntugahweme rwose!
Komeza butarira, Mar' imirimo!

Kora bugiye kwira! Ubu harabona.
Bugiye kugoroba, Gira n' ingoga!
Ugeze ko bwira rwose, Izuba rirenze,
Ntugatuze gukora, Mar' imirimo!

Mu gitondo njya ndirimba,
Nguhimbaza Mwami,
Nguh' amasengesho,
Kuko nkwiringiye.

Ku misozi niho Yesu,
Yajyag' asabira;
No gutakambira Data,
Ngw adukiz' ibyago.

Mwam' unyoboresh' Umwuka.
Mu nzir' itunganye.
Untunganiriz' ubwenge,
Meny' ibikwiriye.

Abubah' izina ryawe,
Urajy' ubumvira.
Ubakingir' imbabazi.
Bakir'amakuba.

Mwese musingiz' Umwami muti: Izina ryawe ryubahwe.
Mwami niw' ugir' ishimwe ryose, Izina ryawe ryubahwe.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Mwubah' izina, Mwubah' izina!
Mwubah' izina ry' Umwami!
Mwubah' izina, Mwubah' izina!
Mwubah' izina ry' Umwami!

Yesu zina ritumar' ubwoba, Mwubah' izina ry' Umwami!
Ni nk' inanga ku bafit' ibyaha, Mwubah' izina ry' Umwami!

Adukiz' imbaraga y' ibyaha, Mwubah' izina ry' Umwami!
Amaraso y' adukiza rwose. Mwubah' izina ry' Umwami!

Dushime Nyir' Umugisha,
Tumushime hasi twese;
N' abo mw' ijuru dushime,
Dat' Umwan' Umwuka Wera.

Nsingiz' ibambe ry' Umwami, Wujuj' is' imyaka;
Yaremeshej' ijambo rye, Ibizima byose.
Mwami mbon' ibitangaza, Byaw' aho ndeba hose,
Hano hasi no hejuru, Ntabwo bihinyuka.

Nta kiriho na gitoya, Kitakwerekana.
Imvura n' izuba biba, Kw' itegeko ryawe.
Uh' ibizima kubaho, Kand' ubitunga byose.
Ntaho twahungir' Imana, Kuko ntahw' itaba.

Muramy' Umwami waremye byose,
Nimuhimbaze mwes' urukundo rwe,
N' umuvunyi wacu niw' uhoraho,
Agoswe n' ibyiza birabagirana.

Mumwamamaze! Nyir' imbabazi!
Yihunz' umucyo, Akwiriye hose,
Ibicu bikoranywa, N' icyusa cye,
Acyahish' abant' urusaku rw' inkuba.

Agir' ubuntu bukwira hose,
Bwuj' ikirere, Buba no mu mucyo,
Butemba mu misozi n' ibisiza,
Nibw' ikime n' imvura biturukamo.

Tur' igitaka, Tworoshye twese.
Turakwizera kuk' udahemuka;
Imbabazi zawe n' akamenyero.
Mubyey' ugir' ibambe, Mukiza mwiza.

Data tuj' ah' uri, Ko tudafit' undi, Ni wow' udukiza, Niko kuza.
Niba tutabana, Is' irimw' ishavu. Uduhumurize, Data mwiza.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Data tuj' ah' uri, Ntutubuze.
Niw' uzi gukiza, Twumvir' ubu.

Dukiz' ababisha, Dukize n' ibyago, Dutuz' imitima, Mu makuba.
Ntitugir' intege, Twuzuz' imbaraga, Dutiz' amaboko, Ngo tuneshe.

Twuzuz' imbabazi, Tur' abawe rwose, Tuyobor' iteka, Twang' ibyaha.
Tugumane Mwami, Kand' ubwo tuzapfa, Ntuzatwibagirwe, Tuzabane.

Ntumpiteho Mukiza we! Wumv' uko nganya.
Ubw' ugenderer' abandi, Nanjye ntunsige.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Yewe Mukiza! Umv' uko nganya.
Ubw' ugenderer' abandi, Nanjye ntunsige.

Njye neger' intebe yawe, Mpabw' imbabazi.
Ngupfukamire, mbabaye, Mpa kukwizera.

Ntaw' undi nakwiringira, Ni wowe nshaka.
Mvur' ibikomere byanjye, Umbabarire.

Ur' isoko y' amahoro, Nyir' ubugingo.
Singir' undi niyambaza, Keretse wowe.

Gihe cyiza cyo gusenga, Kintarura mu mpagarara;
Ngo nigir' aho Dat' ari, Muganyir' ibyo nkennye byose.
Mu bihe by' umubabaro, Nabony' ibimpumuriza.
Ntsind' ubukana bw' Umwanzi , Mu bihe byiza byo gusenga.

Gihe cyiza cyo gusenga, Jy' unsohorez' amasengesho,
K' Uwiteka ntahemuka , Aratwiteze ngw aduhire,
Ndamwihereje rwos' ubu, Y ' uk' ubwe yampamagaye,
Niringiy' imbabazi ze, Nogez' ibihe byo gusenga.

Gihe cyiza cyo gusaba, Urajy' uhor' umpumuriza,
Ugez' aho nger' iwacu, Nzataha nzamuwe mu bicu,
Mpembw' ibihembo by' abera, Nibyo bizaramb' iteka.
Ubwo nibwo nzasezera ku bihe byiza byo gusenga.

Imins' itandat' ishize, Indi Sabat' itangiye.
Nezezwa no kuruhuka, Mur' uyu muns' uhiriwe.

Nimuze mushim' Umwami, Wabahaye kuruhuka.
Umugisha w' uyu munsi, Urut' uw' iyindi yose.

Tunezerwe mu mitima, Twishimir' ibyo mw' ijuru.
Mu buruhukiro bwacu, Ku Mwami nyir' Isabato.

Ituza riva mw' ijuru, Ritwuzure twebwe twese,
Hos' itorero ry' Imana, Rikir' imitima myinshi.

Wicogora mur' iki gihe, Ba maso n' imperuka.
Rind' udatsindwa n' iby' iyi si, Mukristo jy' usaba.
Uz' uk' umubir' uremba, Kand' umwanz' arakaze.
Utegereze nyir' ubukwe, Ba mas' utarambirwa.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Komez' ujy' usaba, Komez' ujy' usaba.
Jya wirind' iteka ku manywa na n' ijoro,
Ntugahweme gusaba.

Tsemb' ibishukw' imbere yawe, Rek' imitima myinshi.
Uzaruhukira mw' ijuru, Nihw' uzaturiza.
Jy' uhor' usaba Mukristo, Umwam' arakwiteze.
Ibuk' uko yaguhorewe, Bamuvush' amaraso.

Ntugahweme kwambaza Yesu, Jy' ubana naw' iteka
Ntugahug' ibitum' utsinda, Tegerez' Umwami.
Wirushy' uzuyaza rwose, Reka gushidikanya.
N' igihe cyo kumwitegura, Ntugahweme kwambaza.

Wibuk' Isabato, Umwami yahiriye.
N' umus' urut' iyindi, N' umuns' unezeza.
Turuhukamw' imirimo, Tubwirwamw iby' ijuru.
Niwo mucy' umurika, Uva ku Mwam' Imana.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Utuzanir' amahoro, Sabato nziza rwose.
Utuzanir' amahoro, Sabato nziza.

Jya wez' Isabato, Maz' uramy' uwo Mwami,
Wabwiy' intumwa z' ati: Ndi nyir' ubugingo.
Niba twicisha bugufi, Dukorer' Umukiza,
Tuzajyanwa kw' isoko, Y' amazi y' ubugingo.

Twishime, twezwemo, Turirimbire Yesu,
Inshuti yacu nziza, Tumutekereze.
Mukiza mwiz' udukunda, Isezerano ryawe,
Ng' uzaba muri twebwe, Niryo ritunezeza.

N' umunsi wera wo kuruhuka, Muns' uhiriwe w' amahoro;
Ukiz' intebyi n' ufit' ishavu, Mwiz' ushimwa mu yindi yose.
Mwami mur' uwo munsi, Bose bagusingiza,
Ngo weze, weze, weze, Kukw' ariw' uhorahw' iteka.

N' icyambu kibamw' ituza ryinshi, Ntikibamw' imidugararo.
Ni nk' umurima w' Iparadiso, Imigezi myiz' inyuramo.
Usa n' isokw' ifuka, Iy' amapfa yacanye.
Ni nkaho tubonera, Igihugu cy' isezerano.

N' umunsi twongerwamw' imbaraga, N' umuns' uduter' urukundo.
Ni w' utuma turek' iby' iyi si, Tukegukir' ibyo mw' ijuru.
Tuboner' imbabazi, Mur' uyu munsi mwiza.
Dushake kuruhuka, No ku rurembo rwo mw' ijuru.

Nkunda guterana kw' Isabato,
Kwig' Ijambo ry' Imana.
Teraniro ryiza ry' abigishwa,
Undutira byose.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Huriro (huriro) rishimwa (rishimwa),
Huriro (huriro) rishimwa (rishimwa).
Teraniro ryiza ry' abigishwa,
Undutira byose.

Niho namenyey' iby' ubugingo,
Mbon' uburyo nihana,
Nitoraniriz' ibitunganye,
Nibyo binnezeza.

Aho niho Yesu yantoreye,
Ambwiz' ijwi rye ryiza.
Ubwo nibwo namwitoraniye,
Mw' ihuriro ryiza.

Dukoze gatandatu, Tubwirizwa n' Imana.
None dushak' ihirwe, Mu rusengero rwayo.
N' umuns' urut' iyindi, Unshuz' ibyo mw' ijuru.
N' umuns' urut' iyindi, Niw' unshuz' ibyo mw' ijuru.

Tugusab' umugisha, Mw' izina ry' Umukiza.
Tugirir' imbabazi, Udutsembehw' ibyaha.
Ducike ku by' iyi si, Turuhukane nawe.
Ducike ku by' iyi si, Uruhukire muri twe.

Twaje kugusingiza, Ngwino dusaban' ubu,
Tubon' ubwiza bwawe, Mu rusengero rwawe.
Mwam' uduhe kumenya, Ibyiza byo mw' ijuru.
Mwam' uduhe kumenya, Uko bizaba mw' ijuru.

Ubutumwa bugwire, Bukiz' abanyabyaha.
Imbabazi zihoza, Abagutakambira.
Duhe kugusingiza, Twez' Isabato nziza.
Duhe kugusingiza, Tuguman' itek' iteka.

Nshim' Isabato yera, Imana yaduhaye.
Ngo tujye turuhuka, Tuwunezererwemo.

N' umuns' ubamw' ituza, Uhoramw' ibyishimo.
Biduhuz' agahinda, Kugeza ku mperuka.

N' umuns' uduhimbara, Tukawizihirwamo,
Twongerwamw' imbaraga, Tukuzuzw' umugisha.

Kaze Sabato nziza, Munsi w' ikiruhuko,
Duhabwamw' umugisha, Tukamererwa neza.

Twumvis' inkuru nziza, Ko Yesu akiza.
Kwiz' uwo munezero, Ko Yesu akiza.
Bibwir' abantu bose, Uzambuke n' inzuzi.
Umwami ngo jya hose, Ni Yesu ukiza.

Ukwize no mu nyanja, Ko Yesu akiza.
Tyo bwir' abacumuye, Ko Yesu akiza.
Himbaz' abo mu birwa, Kukw' amakuru meza.
Azumvikana hose, Ko Yesu akiza.

Mw irasaniro muti: Ni Yesu ukiza.
Yaducunguye twese, Ni Yesu ukiza.
Ririmbir' abatebye, Bashak' ubatabara.
Ririmba ku bituro, Ko Yesu akiza.

N' imiyag' ivug' iti: Ni Yesu ukiza.
Amoko yos' ashime, Ko Yesu akiza.
Jy' urangurur' ijw' uti: Mwese muze mukizwe!
Dusingiz' ubutwari, Ko Yesu akiza.

Ndagushaka Mukiza we! Ntabwo mbasha kwigenza.
Ndifuza k' umpora hafi, Gumy' unyikomereze.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Sinzagir' icyo ntinya,
Umbwiriz' iby' ushaka.
Nta cyambuza kuz' ah' uri,
Ngukurikir' ah' ujya.

Ndagushaka Mukiza we! Kuko noroshye cyane.
Niw' umbwir' ibinkomeza, Nta wundi mbitezeho.

Ndagushaka Mukiza we! Aho ndi mur' iyi si.
Mu muvumbi no ku zuba, Mu bimbabaza byose.

Ndagushaka Mukiza we! Mbwiriz' ibitunganye.
Ungeze kuri Yor'dani, Umpe no kuyambuka.

Iyo nibuts' umusarab' utangaza,
Umwami nyir' ishema yatangiyeho,
Ibyo nungukaga, ntabwo mba nkibyitayeho.
Nzinukw' ibyo niratanaga.

Reb' inkovu zo ku mubiri we wose,
Zituma ngir' ishavu n' umunezero.
Har' ubw' ishavu n' ibyishimo bijya bihura.
Har' utak' ikamba mu mahwa?

Nari narazimiye meze nk' impabe.
Ariko narokotse kubw' ibyago bye;
Ntunzibukira ntagir' ikindi niratana,
Kerets' umusaraba wawe.

Nahw' ibyaremwe byose byab' ar' ibyanjye,
Ntacyo nabona nakugereranyaho;
Urukundo, n' ubuntu byaturutse mw' ijuru,
Bituma ndek' ibyanjye byose.

Nta nshuti nziza nka Yesu, Atsemb' ibyaha byacu.
N' amahirwe kumwizera, Kukw' atwuzuza na Se.
Iyo tubabaye rwose, Dufit' ishavu ryinshi,
Adusohoza ku Mana, Yumv' amaganya yacu.

Nitugir' ibyago byinshi, Tugatotezwa cyane,
Byoye kuduter' ubwoba, Tumwiringire rwose;
Nta wundi wabidukiza, Abiduhemuraho.
Yes' az' intege nke zacu, Jya wisung' Uwiteka.

Nitugir' ishavu ryinshi, Tukababara rwose,
Yesu niw' uturokora; Komez' umwizigire.
Nibakugira ruvumwa, Wisung' Umwami Yesu.
Ntazagir' ubw' aguhana, Jy' uhor' umwizigiye.

Yes' araguhamagara none, Arakwifuz' uyu munsi;
N' iki gituma wanga kwitaba, Ukayobagurika?

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Yes' arahamagar' abarushye, Ngw' abaruhur' uyu munsi;
Umwikorez' umutwaro wawe; Ntazagushor' inshucu.

Yes' aragutegereje none, Musange non' uyu munsi;
Zan' ibyaha byaw' ubyicujije, Ngwino witindiganya.

Yes' arakwinginga, wumv' ijwi rye; Mwumvire non' uyu munsi.
Abamwiringira bazishima; Haguruk' umusange!

Hanze har' umushyitsi, Kingura! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )
Yahoz' ategereje, Kingur' ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )
Kingurir' Umukiza, Ataraguhitaho; Yes' Umwana w' Imana;
Kingur' ubu ! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )

Ugurur' umutima, Kingura ! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )
N' uzuyaz' aragenda, Kingur' ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )
Niwe nshuti - magara; Azajy' akurengera, Kand' akurind' iteka:
Kingur' ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )

Ntiwumv' ukw' akwinginga? Kingura! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )
Muhitemw‘ ubu ngubu, Kingur' ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )
Ahagaze ku rugi; Azaguhesh' ihirwe, Maz' ujy' umuhimbaza;
Kingur' ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )

Akir' uwo mushyitsi, Kingura! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )
Azasangira nawe, Kingur' ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )
Azakubabarira; Iby' isi nibishira, Akujyane mw' ijuru;
Kingur' ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )

Harih' uwasanze Yesu n' ijoro, Amubaz' iby' inzira y' agakiza.
Yes' amusubiz' amweruriy' ati : N' ukuri nkubwire :

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Namwe nimwite kur' iryo jambo rye, Kuko Yesu yarivuz' aryeruye;
Nibyo bizabagirir' umumaro, Dor' aravug' ati :

Abashak' uburuhukiro bose, No kuririmbana n' abacunguwe,
No guhabw' ubugingo buhoraho, Mwite kur' ibi ngo:

Mucunguzi wanjye, wumv' uko ntaka; Ngwin' unyirokorere.
Umutima wanjy' ugoswe n' ibyago; Ngwin' unyirokorere.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Mwami, singira shinge na rugero; Ngwin' unyirokorere.
Kwitabwaho nawe nibyo byanyura; Ngwin' unyirokorere.

Dore ndi jyenyine, nabay' impabe; Ngwin' unyirokorere.
Nubuy' amaso ngo mbeshweho nawe; Ngwin' unyirokorere.

Ntuhinyur' umutim' ushenjaguwe; Ngwin' unyirokorere,
Nyamunek' ita ku gusenga kwanjye, Ngwin' unyirokorere.

Ashobora gukiza! Mubyamamaze hose;
Ashobora gukiz' umwumvira wese,
Akamwarura mu murir' ugurumana.
Yes' ashobora gukiza ushaka wese.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Ashobora kugukiza, No kukurokor' ubu;
Mwene Data n' umwizera, azagukiza.

Ashobora gukiza! Mbese n' ukuri koko?
Ahw' afit' imbarag' ibasha kunkiza?
Mbwira, nyamuna mbwira, Mbese Kristo wishwe,
Yashobora kumbohora, akandokora?

Ashobora gukiza! Mugenzi we komera!
N' uyoboka Yesu azakurokora.
Ntugatinye Satani, Jy' ugundira Yesu;
Reka kujy' ushidikanya, Jy' umwiringira.

Twubake ku Rutare rw' iteka, Nirwo Yes' umucunguzi;
Nibwo tuzabasha gushikama, Umugaru n' utera.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Harihw' abubaka ku musenyi, Barangamiy' iby' iyi si;
Abandi bubaka ku muraba w' ibyaha no kwikuza.

Twubake ku Rutare rw' ukuri, Nirwo rushikam' iteka.
Kurwiringira kuzahoraho, Nirwo gakiza kacu.

Menyesh' ibya Yesu byose, Maz' ubinyandikemo;
Mbwir' ibye by' ingenzi byose, Nezezwa no kubyumva.
Mbwir' ukw' abamarayika baririmbye yavutse,
Ngw' Icyubahiro ku Mana, Amahoro abe mu b' isi.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Menyesh' ibya Yesu byose, Maz' ubinyandikemo.
Mbwir' ibye by' ingenzi byose, Nezezwa no kubyumva.

Mbwir' iby' umusaraba we, Uwo bamubambyeho,
Mbwira n' aho bamuhambye, Mbwira n' uko yazutse,
N' urukundo ruhebuje, Ntacyo narugeraho.
Dore, ndababaye, mbwira iby' urukundo rwancunguye.

Yes' Umwungeri mwiza, Aragutarura,
Ngo winjire mw' ishyo rye; Nih' uzaruhukira.
Ngwin' ugif' ubusore, Ngwin' ukiri muto;
Injir' uzarindwa rwose, Ntuzagir' icy' uganya.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Aragutaruran' urukundo, ati:
Wa mpabe we, ngwino nsanga.
Dor' Umukiz' arategereje,
Yes' Umwungeri wanjye.

Yes' Umwungeri mwiza, Yarakwitangiye;
Araguhamagara ati: Nyabuna ngwino,
Gira bwang' uve mu kaga, Ntugumye, kwijyana.
Injir' uzarindwa rwose, Wibere mu mahoro.

Reka kuragiriza, Isega yateye,
Ishak' intama zose, Zazimiriye kure.
Arik' Umwungeri mwiza, Arakuburira;
Injir' uzarindwa rwose, Muban' akaramata.

Umucamanza n' agera, Akarondor' ibyacu,
Tuzamera nk' izahabu, Cyangwa s' inkamb' itabwa?

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Naratuwe mu gipimo,
Nsangwa ntashyitse;
Naratuwe n' ijambo rye,
Nsangwa ntashyitse.

Mbese tuzumv' ishimwe ngo: Nuko, wakoze neza;
Cyangw' iteka ryo gupfa ngo: Mwasanzwe mudashyitse?

Nimutyo twite kw' ijwi rye, Igihe kikiriho.
Tureke gutindiganya, Tumaramaze rwose.

Wumv' amagambo y' Umukiza; Niy' aguhesh' ubugingo.
Wa munyabyaha we, menya ko hahirw' abakomez' amategeko.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Hahirw' abayakomeza yose,
Nibo bahirwa, barahirwa;
Hahirw' abayakomeza yose,
Barahirwa, barahirwa.

Kuyumva gusa nta kamaro, N'ukutugwabiza rwose;
Kuyumva dutinya, ntibyadukiza, Hahirw' abayumvira yose.

Bazinjiran' umunezero mu mudugudu w' Imana,
Ahatab' ishavu n' umubabaro, Beger' igiti cy' ubugingo.

title: Nta Nshuti Nziz' Ihwanye Na Yesu

hymnContent.content:
Nta nshuti nziz' ihwanye na Yesu; Nta n' imwe! nta n' imwe!
Nta wundi wabasha kudukiza; Nta wundi! nta wundi!

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Yes' az' ibiturushya byose;
Azabana natw' iteka.
Nta ncuti nziz' ihwanye na Yesu,
Nta n' imwe! nta n' imwe!

Nta nshut' ibahw' ikomeye nka we; Nta n' imwe! nta n' imwe!
Nyamara nta wiyoroshya nka we; Nta n' umwe! nta n' umwe!

Nta kanya na gato tutabana; Ye nta ko! ye nta ko!
Nta joro ryira tutari kumwe; Ye nta ryo! ye nta ryo!

Mbese har' uwo yigez' ahana? Nta n' umwe! Nta n' umwe!
Mbese har' umunyabyah' aheza? Nta n' umwe! nta n' umwe!

Harihw' impano yahwana nawe? Nta n' imwe! nta n' imwe!
Mbese har' uwo yavuts' ijuru? nta n' umwe! nta n' umwe!

Kurabukw' umusaraba wawe, Mwami nibyo byambeshaho;
Sinita ku manjwe y' iby' isi, Ntez' agakiza ku musaraba.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
S. :

Kurabukw' i Golgota,
Nibyo bizambeshaho.
Mbeg' amahirwe yanjye,
Yo kurabukwa Yesu!
A., T. na B. :

Kurabu … Go… Golgota,
Nibyo bi … mbe … mbeshaho.
Mbeg' amahirwe yanjye…rwe yanjye,
Yo kurabukwa Yesu! …rabukwa Yesu.

Ubwo nari nkibon' Umukiza, Yanyakirany' ibyishimo;
Na n' ubu ningir' ibindwanya, Kumurabukwa nibyo byankiza.

Nzajya mpang' amas' umusaraba, Kandi mwiringire rwose.
Nta wutumbir' umusaraba, Wari wiger' aneshwa n' Umwanzi.

Yes' araguhamagaran' ituza, Ub' arahamagara;
Ategereje k' umwiyegurira, We kuzuyaza; ngwino.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Ngwino ( ngwino); Ngwino (ngwino);
Abarushye mwese nimuze.
Yes' araguhamagaran' ituza, ati:
Mukundwa, ngwino.

Twatinzwa n' iki, kand' ategereje kuturokora twese?
Twahinyuzwa n' ik' imbabazi zose adufitiye twese?

Twakererew' ibihe birahita, Aradutegereje;
Turarindagirira mu mwijima; Nimutyo tumusange.

Zirikan' urukundo ruhebuje, Yadusezeranije;
N' ubwo twagomye, Tuzababarirwa; Aradutegereje.

Har' irembo ryuguruwe, Ryatumye mpishurirwa.
Umusaraba wa kure, Yesu yatangiyeho.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Mbeg' ineza n' imbabazi byatumye nugururirwa!
Nugururiwe, Iman' ihimbazwe!

Irembo ryugururiwe abashak' agakiza;
Ngw' abakire n' abakene bose barinyuremo.

Nshuti komez' utwaran' irembo ricyuguruwe.
Ikorer' umusaraba; Nibw' uzahabw' ikamba.

Tumaze kwambuk' uruzi, Dute wa musaraba;
Twambikw' amakamba meza, Twitahire mw' ijuru.

Umukiz' ageze hafi, Yes' Umukunzi wanjye.
Yazanywe no guhembura; Mwese nimumwumvire.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Nta wuhwany' izina nawe,
Rirut' amazina yose.
Nta wusingizwa nkawe;
Yesu mwiza rwose.

Icyubahiro kib' icye; Mutyo twizere Yesu.
Nkund' izina ry' Umukiza; Nkund' izina rya Yesu.

Izina rye rirankiza, Rikamar' agahinda.
Nta kinezeza nko kumva, Iryo zina rya Yesu.

N' az' azatugororera, Ikamba ry' ubugingo.
Ubwo nibwo tuzicara, Tuvug' iby' agakiza.

Dor' umutima wawe, Wuzuyemw' amaganya.
Nta mwanya wasigiye Yesu ngo yinjiremo?
Ub' ahagaze ku rugi, Arakomanga yinginga.
Nta mwanya wasigiye Yesu ngo yinjiremo?

Upfush' igih' ubusa, Kand' ar' ingenzi rwose.
Mbese nta mwany' ufite wo gukorera Yesu?
Nturarushy' ugerageza gutarur' abazimiye;
Mbese nta mwany' ufite wo gukorera Yesu?

Mbese k' umaranira kwishakir' ubutunzi,
Nta gih' ufite washishikarir' ibya Yesu?
Dor' uharanira kwikubir' ibinezeza by' isi;
Nta gih' ufite washishikarir' ibya Yesu?

Wabay' ingumba nk' igiti cy' ibibabi gusa.
Mbese ntabwo wazerer' Umwami Yes' imbuto?
Ntacy' ufite cyo kuzamumurikira n' agaruka;
Mbese ntabwo wazerer' Umwami Yes' imbuto?

Mwami ndumv' ijwi ryawe, Rindarika ngo nze,
Nuhagizwe ya maraso, Wamviriye kera.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Mukiza ndaje, Ubu nj' ah' uri!
Nyejesha ya maraso, Wamviriye kera.

N' ubwo nje nahindanye, Ntunyirengagize;
Ahubw' umboneze rwose, Mb' umweru waka de.

Yesu niw' unkomeza, Niw' umpa gutsinda;
Ng' urukundo n' amahoro, Binsabemo rwose.

Mwese nimwishimire! Ya maras' akiza,
Yatwujuje na Rurema, Ngo tub' abana be.

Ndumv' Umukiz' ambwira, Ko mbuz' imbaraga;
Ngo: Njye museng' iteka, Ntacyo nzamuburana.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Yanndihiriye imyenda yose;
Yambabariy' ibyaha, Bihinduk' umweru.

Niw' ufit' imbaraga, Zihagije rwose;
Zo gukiz' ababembe, Zikoroshy' umutima.

Ubwo nta cyiza nkora, Nibesherejweho;
N' ubuntu bwawe gusa, Ni wowe nkesha byose.

Imbere ya ya ntebe, Nzahahagarara;
Nzaba njyany' iminyago, Nyishyikirize Yesu.

Harihw' isokw' itukura, Ivamw' amaraso;
Niy' Umwami yamviriye, Ngw' ayandokoreshe.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Nduz' umuvu w' amaraso;
Ndayogamo nere rwose!
Haleluya! Aranyeza,
Aranyeza, Aranyeza!

Mpinduts' icyaremwe gishya, Mbyaw' ubwa kabiri.
Ntsinze kamere ya kera, Nzahora ndi mushya.

Nsigaye mvirwa n' umucyo, Sinkirindagira;
Nshitse ku ngoyi z' umwanzi, Mbatuwe na Yesu.

Mbeg' ubuntu butangaje! Kwejeshw' amaraso!
Byanyujuje n' Umukiza, Yesu wambambiwe.

Data, ndambuy' amaboko; Nta wundi wamfasha;
Iy' unyivumburiy' ukamvaho, Mbes' ahandi najya ni he?

Nizey' Umwana waw' ubu, Undem' umutima;
Ujy' unkenur' umar' ubukene, Nkomeze nemerwe nawe.

Nyir' ukwizera ni wowe, Nuburiy' amaso;
Icyamp' ukangwiriza kwizera, Kuko ntagufite napfa.

Ntuzantererane ngo mpfe, Ahubw' umbesheho;
Nibwo nzacika ku kinyoma, Mbishobojwe n' Umwuka wawe.

Nakwishima cyane rwose, Nibaniye nawe;
Maze nkakumv' umpumuriz' umbwira ko nagiriw' ubuntu.

Nizeye rwos' ubu yuko, Yesu yampfiriye;
Kandi kubw' amaraso ye yeza, Nzabaturwa mve mu byaha.

Nzasingiz' urukundo rwa Yesu, Wambambiwe;
Yemeye kumanuka, Azanywe no kumpfira.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Yesu yambabarijwe, Ntararushya mbabara;
Yahoze ansabira, Ntarameny' iyo bijya.

Urukundo rw' Imana, Mbega ngo rurankiza!
Ibyaha byanjye byose, Bikantamururwaho!

Nta cyiza nakoreye, Umwami wankunz' atyo;
None maze kwemezwa, Mwami nguhaye byose.

Har' izina rihebuje, Rirut' ayandi yose nzi;
Ni ry' Imana yaturemye yis' Umwana way' ikunda.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Ni ryo zina ryera (izina );
Ni ryo zina ryera ( ryera de ) !
Ryakomotse ku Mana, Riza mw isi,
Maze riririmbwa ( izina ) n' abamarayika ( ryera de ).
Iryo zina n' irya Yesu.

Niryo rimpesh' umugisha; Nkunda kuryogez' iteka.
Simpwema kuriririmba, Mvug' ukuntu rihebuje.

Icyampa nkaririmbana n' abamarayika bera,
Nkajya nsingiza rya zina rihebuj' ayandi yose!

Nkukw' izuba rituvira, Rikarabagirana,
Nik' umucyo wo mw' ijuru wansabye mu mutima,
Wawukuyemw' iby' amanjwe, Utangaz' ibihishwe;
Kuko mu mutima wanjye, Nahatuj' Umukiza.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Mbeg' umucyo w' agatangaza,
Wansabye mu mutima!
Ineza y' Umwami Yesu,
Yambereye nk' umucyo.

Natay' agahinda kose; Ntabwo nkikitayeho;
Kuk' unyambik' amahoro, Ameze nk' umwitero,
Nkwerekejeh' umutima, Ndakwishimiye cyane.
Nzagezw' i wawe mw' ijuru, Na rwa rukundo rwawe.

Mukiza warancunguye; Nd' uwaw' uko ndi kose.
Nyemerera nguhimbaze, Nkuber' umucyo waka.
Nkwerekejeh' umutima, Ndakwishimiye cyane.
Nzagezw' i wawe mw' ijuru, Na rwa rukundo rwawe.

Njya nkunda kuririmb' indirimbo, Ngo yarancunguye.
Niwe waciy' ingoyi z' umwanzi, Maz' arambatura.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Sop:

Kuk' ubwe yancunguye; Kuk' ubwe yancunguye,
Nzahimbaz' izina rye. Kuk' ubwe yancunguye,
Nzaririmbir' uwandokoye.

A.T.B.:

Kuk' ubwe yancunguye; Kuk' ubwe yancunguye;
Kuk' ubwe yancunguye, Nzahimbaz' izina rye.
Kuk' ubwe yancunguye, Kuk' ubwe yancunguye;
Nzaririmbir' uwandokoye.

Mfit' Umukiz' unogeye rwose, Niwe wancunguye.
Mpimbazwa no gukor' iby' ashaka, Kuko yancunguye.

Nzahora mpamya ntacyo nikenga, Yuko yancunguye.
Sinzashidikanya ngo ncogore, Kuko yancunguye.

Mfit' aho yanteguriye heza, Kuko yancunguye.
Niho nzibanira naw' iteka, Kuko yancunguye.

Iman' ikund' utunyoni, Tuba mur' iyi si;
Ubwo yita ku tunyoni, Nzi ko nanjy' inkunda.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Niy' irimbish' uburabyo, Buhumura neza;
Ubw' ikund' uburaby' ityo, Nzi ko nanjy' inkunda.

Imana yaremye byose, Ntigir' icy' isobwa.
Nzi kw' ikund' abana bose, Nzi ko nanjy' inkunda.

N' igihe cyo gusenga, Twicishe bugufi, Duteraniye hamwe turamya Yesu,
Nituza tumwizeye, Azajy' aturinda; Mbeg' ihumure ryiza, ryo kwibanira nawe!

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
N' igihe cyiza cyo kuramy' Umwami,
Mbeg' ihumure ryiza, ryo kwibanira na we!

N' igihe cyo gusenga, Umwam' ari hafi, Kand' adufitiy' ibambe rya kibyeyi.
Tumuganyir' ibyacu, Dushir' agahinda; Mbeg' ihumure ryiza, ryo kumvikana nawe!

N' igihe cyo gusenga, no gushyikirana, N' Imana yac' ihor' ituzirikana,
Iturem' agatima, tub' indahangarwa; Mbeg' ihumure ryiza, ryo kumvikana nawe!

N' igihe cyo gusenga, twiringiye Yesu. Twizeye kw' azaduh' ibyo, tumusaba,
Kukw' atangan' ubuntu, ataziganije. Mbeg' ihumure ryiza, ryo gutabarwa nawe!

Yesu waduhaye isezerano, K' uzabana natwe, niduterana,
Naho twaba babiri, Cyangwa batatu,
Uzab' uri kumwe n' abana bawe.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Yesu, ngwin' uduhire, Tutarava hano;
Yesu ngwin' uduhire ubu, Tuban' iteka.

Nd' uwawe Mwami, Ubu nditanze;
Numvis' ubury' udukunda.
Nsingiriz' amabok' untabare,
Njye nibanire nawe.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
S.A :

Hafi yawe, Nibyo nifuza,
Ku musaraba wawe.
Hafi yawe, Mwami, tuban' iteka,
Njye nibanira nawe.

T.B :

Hafi yawe cyane, ni byo nifuza,
Ku musaraba wawe.
Hafi yawe, Mwami, Tuban' iteka,
Njye nibanira nawe.

Nkwiyeguriye namaramaje,
Nkoresh' umurimo wawe;
Nkwerekejeh' umutima wanjye,
Ng' uhor' ugengwa nawe.

Kubana nawe birahebuje,
Nibyo bindutira byose.
Iyo mpfukamye, nkakuganyira,
Dusabana nk' inshuti.

Sinashobora kukurondora,
Ngo mmeny' urukundo rwawe.
Ruzahishurwa turi mw' ijuru,
Aho twateguriwe.

Yes' unkomereze, Ku musaraba wawe;
Har' isokw' ibeshaho, Itemb' i Kal'vari.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Umusaraba wa Yesu nzawirata,
Kugez' ubwo nzabona uburuhukiro.

Hafi y' umusaraba, Mpaboner' iteka,
Imbabazi n' impuhwe, Bitarondoreka.

Hafi y' umusaraba, Intama y' Imana,
Niyo yahangejeje, Ntsind' ibimbabaza.

Hafi y' umusaraba, Niho ntegereje;
Niringiye kugera, Mu bwami bw' Imana.

Nyemerera ngendane nawe, Mana, Nk' ukw' Enoki yagenje.
Nyoboresh' ukuboko kwawe, Unyerekez' ah' ushaka hose.
Nubw' inzir' itagaragara, Nkomeze njyane nawe, Mwami.

Icyampa nkarangurura, Ngahimbaz' Umwami wanjye,
Ariko ni nde wabasha kuririmb' ishimwe rya Yesu?

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Urukundo ruhebuje! Urukundo rwa Yesu!
Urukundo ruhebuje! Urukundo rwa Yesu!

Niwe munezero wanjye, Ni naw' umpesh' amahoro.
Mu makuba no mu byago, Yesu niw' umber' ihumure.

Niwe byiringiro byanjye, Byo kuzahabw' ubugingo.
Mu mwijim' amber' umucyo, Yesu niw' umber' ihumure.

title: Mwami Nzi Kw' Ari We Nkunda

hymnContent.content:
Mwami, nzi kw' ari We nkunda, Kurut' iby' iyi si;
Kuko wampay' amahoro, Atagir' impinduka.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Urukundo rwankijije (ngakira), Ntirurondoreka.
Ntitwarusobanukirwa (na hato), Kuko ruhebuje (ruhebuje).

Nzi k' uhor' unzirikana, Undutira byose,
Mwami, kugutekereza bindutir' ibyiratwa.

Wanyujuj' umunezero, Natay' umuruho.
Kumenya k' unkunda cyane, Nibyo bimpumuriza.

Mucunguzi wanjye mwiza, Icyakunyereka!
Ngo tuzabane mw' ijuru, Ahatab' agahinda.

Ahw' azanyobora hose, Niho nzishimira kujya;
Kukw' ari jye yapfiriye, Akanzir' atacumuye.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Yes' azanyobor' iteka, Maz' angez' iw' amahoro;
Kukw' ar' inshuti y' ukuri, Itigeze guhemuka.

Nishimira kw' antegeka, Nishimira kw' anyobora.
Nishimira kumwumvira, Kukw' ari jye yapfiriye.

Singishidikanya rwose, Kuko ndi kumwe na Yesu.
Nizigiye ko vub' aha, Nzamureba duhanganye.

Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa.
Mpaz' umunezero wayo, Uzashirana nayo.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Imbabazi zidashira,
N' urukundo rw' iteka,
Nibyo bijya binyemeza,
Ko nzaramishwa nawe.

Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa.
Mu kaga niwe humure; Nzahora nezerewe.

Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa.
Icyamp' akamwenyurira, Nkamurikirwa nawe.

Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa.
Nzirat' umusaraba we, Yatangiyeho kera.

Mwami wanjye nyakira, Ndakwiyeguriy' ubu;
Ngay' amaboko yanjye, Yakoresh' uk' ushaka.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Ngib' ibirenge byanjye, Byerekez' ah' ushaka.
Ngir' ijwi ryanjye na ryo, Rijye riguhimbaza.

Nguhay' akanwa kanjye; Mwami, kakuvugire.
Ngub' ubutunzi bwanjye, Sinzagir' icyo nkwima.

Nguhay' igihe cyanjye, Sinzakiguteraho;
Nguhay' ubwenge bwanjye, Bukoresh' uk' ushaka.

Ngiy' imigambi yanjye; Igengwe nawe, Mwami.
Nguy' umutima wanjye, Ube uwawe rwose.

Mwam' urukundo rwanjye, Ni wowe nzarukunda;
Nkwihaye nimazeyo, None n' iteka ryose.

Nabony' inshut' ihebuje! Yamberey' impongano.
Urets' ibyo kump' ubugingo, Yaranyitangiriye.
Ntacyo mfite nit' icyanjye, Kuko tubisangiye.
Ndamwiyeguriye burundu; Ibihe bidashira.

Nabony' inshut' ihebuje! Nyir' ubutware bwose!
Nibw' indindish' uko bukeye; Izangeza mw' ijuru.
Ibyiza byanshyizw' imbere, Binsubizamw' intege;
Reka nkore, noye kwiganda, Ngez' ubw' izanduhura.

Nabony' incut' ihebuje! Y' impuhwe n' urukundo.
Niy' indind' ikanyunganira; Niy' indenger' iteka.
Mbese n' iki cyadutanya, Ko dukundana rwose?
N' iby' iyi si, cyangwa s' urupfu? Oya nzab' uw' iteka.

Numvise Yes' ambwir' ati: Ngwino nkuruhure.
Zan' ibikurushya byose, Mbikwikorerere.
Musanga, mez' uko nari ndi, ndushye, mfite n' ishavu;
Amber' uburuhukiro, Maz' aranezeza.

Numvise Yes' ambwir' ati: Ndaguher' ubuntu,
Amaz' azakubeshaho, Unyw' uram' iteka.
Nuko nsanga Yesu maz' ampa ya mazi y' ubugingo,
Nshir' inyota, Ndahembuka; Nzahorana nawe.

Numvise Yes' ambwir' ati: Ni jye Mucyo w' isi.
N' undeb' uramurikirwa, Ntuzarindagira.
Maze muhanz' amaso koko, Mbon' ar' izuba ryanjye;
Rizamvir' iminsi yose y' ubugingo bwanjye.

Mwami, mb' uwawe maramaje, Nyigisha, nyigisha.
Nkor' iby' ukunda, Mwami wanjye; Komez' umfashe.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Iby' iyi si byamarir' iki, Ntari kumwe nawe?
Byose nzabihara kubwawe, Ntungishwe nawe.

Ndets' umunezero w' iyi si, Ngwino twibanire;
Nibyo bizajya binogera, Bimpumurize.

Mbeg' umuns' urush' indi kwera; Niwo wa karindwi!
Ng' uratuma ndek' iby' isi, Nkibwir' iby' ijuru!

Mbeg' uyu munsi wa karindwi, Turuhukiramo,
Ng' uradutera kuramya Data, Wo mw' ijuru!

Ni mutyo turamy' Uhoraho, Watuzirikanye,
Agaherakw' akaduha, Uyu munsi wera.

Niw' utugobotor' ibyaha, Bikaducikaho,
Kukw' atugirir' ubuntu, Buvuye mw' ijuru.

Mukiza, ndamaramaje, Ndatwaranira kugera,
Ku rugero runkwiriye; Mwami mfasha ngo ndusheho.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Ntabwo ngifit' umutima, Wo kuguma mu by' iyi si;
N' ubwo bamwe babikunda, Ngambiriye kujya mbere.

Ndashaka gusumb' iby' isi, Nubw' umwanz' anyibasiye;
Kuko namaze kwizera, Yukw' Iman' izandengera.

Ndashaka kumaranira, Kurabukw' ubwiza bwawe;
Ariko nkomeze nsenge, Ngez' ubwo nzager' i wawe.

Ntushak' urwitwazo, Harihw' imirimo,
Ahubw' itegure gukorer' Imana.
Yakwinginze kenshi, Kand' ikurarika;
Witinda kwemera, Bizakunezeza.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Itaba! ( none ); Ntushak' urwitwazo;
Itaba! ( none ); Wigingimiranya.
Ntushak' urwitwazo, Udasubizwa ngo:
Hoshi wampinyuye; Nkuvukij' ubwami.

Ntushak' urwitwazo, Kuko nib' utinze,
Bizagukoraho, Izakwivumbura.
Imbabazi zayo, Ntabwo zirashira;
Haguruka bwangu, Ubibabarirwe.

Yesu Mwami w' abami, Ngwin' ube muri jye!
He kub' ari jy' uvuga, Ujy' umvugiramo.
Unsabe mu mutima, Ngengwe nawe rwose,
Maz' abajya bandeba, Bajye bakubona.

Ingingo zanjye zose, Zijye zikumvira;
Uzikoreshereze, Zikubahirize.
Ne kujya nivovota, Ngo mpore ku nkeke.
Y' ibimbaho, nishama, Nta mahoro mfite.

Ni wowe ntegereje, Ungenz' uk' ushaka.
Ubwanjye nditeguye, Simfit' ikinziga.
Yesu Mwami w' abami, Ngwin' ube muri jye!
Maz' ibyo nkora byose, Mbikoreshwe nawe.

Data mwiza, nyigiza hafi; Nkube mu gituza;
Ni wowe buhungiro bwanjye, N' uburuhukiro.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
S. na A :

Data, nyigiza hafi, Ndifuza ko tubana;
Data, ndifuza ko tubana.

T. na B :

Data, data, nyigiza hafi,
Ndifuza cyane ko tubana;
Data, nyigiza hafi; ndifuza ko tubana,
Ndifuza ko tubana.

Data mwiza, nyigiza hafi; Nkomeza ntundeke;
Nakwishimira ko tubana, Ne kuraragira.

Data mwiza, nyigiza hafi; Ngez' ubwo nsa nawe;
Mpembur' unyuhagir' unyeze, Mb' umuziranenge.

Aho njyanye na Yesu mb' amahoro, Ahw' anyobora hose mur' iyi si.
Aho njya tutajyanye nta kinyura, Iyo njyanye na Yesu ntacyo ntinya.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Aho njyanye nawe, nta kintinyisha,
Aho njyanye na Yesu mb' amahoro.

Aho njyanye na Yesu sinigunga, Nubw' izindi nshuti zampemukira;
Nubw' anyobora mu nzir' iruhije, Aho njyanye na Yesu ndanezerwa.

Njyanye na Yesu sinatiny' urupfu, N' iyo ngoswe n' umwijima w' icyago,
Nzi ko nzakanguk' ubutazongera, Kujarajarira mur' iy' isi mbi.

Nshuti jy' ugendera mu mucyo, Woye kurindagira;
Umwuka Wera wo mw' ijuru, Ajy' akuyobora.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo

hymnContent.content:
Gendera mu mucyo w' ukuri, Ko mw' Ijambo ry' Imana;
Uzajy' ukuyobor' iteka, Ukwizez' Imana.

Jy' ugendera mu mucy' iteka, Ujy' ukumurikira;
Maz' utamurur' umwijima, Hose hatangaze.

Gendera mu mucyo ng' umenye, Urukundo rw' Imana,
N' uburyo yakunze ab' isi, Ikabarokora.

Mbes' abasaruzi bari hehe, Bo gusarur' abakiranutsi?
Babangir' ukurink' imihoro, Kandi ntibab' ar' abanyabute.

hymnContent.subTitle: Gusubiramo
hymnContent.content:
Abasaruzi se bari he?
Ngo bafatanye natwe gusarura,
Maze twishime, Turi kumwe,
Isarura nirirangira.

Mushakire mu mihana yose; Nubw' urwiri rwarenga ku ngano;
Muzishake kuko zirurimo, Zose muzisarurir' Imana.

Dor' imirima yereye rimwe, Kandi bose bitez' isarura;
Arikw' abasaruzi ni bake, Umurimo wab' urabasaze.

Mwa bantu mwe, Mwahur' imihoro! Musarur' igihe kirageze!
Mushishikare Umwam' araje; Dor' abazaniy' ingororano!
